92b5: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung de ni sems can mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la grangs su byas pa yin te 'di la don dam par na byang chub
92b6: dmigs su med do/ / byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung 'di ltar byang chub ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ grangs thams cad dang bral ba/ gzugs med pa/ bstan
92b7: du med pa ste/ sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ btsong ka ma yin/ shel gyi mdog ma yin/ kha dog med pa/ dbyibs med pa/ rtags me dpa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma thams cad
92b8: las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas med pa/ gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom pa/ dngos po med pa/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba/
93a1: brjod du med pa/ tshig gi lam thams cad kyis rtogs par mi nus pa/ bltar med pa/ ril po ma yin pa/ rdzas med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rtags med pa// dbyibs med pa/
93a2: smar med pa// smos su med pa/ reg par byar med pa/ rnam par shes par mi rung ba/ thos par mi rung ba/ dbyangs med pa/ tshig gi lam med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ ma bcings pa/ ma grol ba/ 'dod
93a3: chags med pa/ zhe sdang med pa/ gti mug med pa/ rgyu thams cad kyis gdags su med pa/ gdags par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ btsun pa 'od srung byang chub ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin pas de ni lus kyis mngon
93a4: par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ / sems kyis kyang mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung lus ni sems med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bod pa snang ba lta bu ste/ des
93a5: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ / sems kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin zhing bltar med pa/ des kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so// gang gis mngon par
93a6: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ btsun pa 'od srung chos thams cad de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin na/ de la ci'i phyir khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
93a7: rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya zhes ji ste de ltar sems par gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
93a8: rten skyong ba de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can bdag cag gi bsam pa dang mos pa bzhin du the tsom dang nem nur dang yid gnyis bsal ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu bden smra 'di ji srid cig na bla na
93b1: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / 'di byang chub thob nas mtshan ci zhes bya bar 'gyur ba dang //
93b2: tshe'i chad ji tsam du 'gyur ba dang / byang chub thob nas de'i 'khor 'dus pa ji snyed cig tu 'gyur ba lung bstan kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong dang /
93b3: dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mde dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyod pa de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
93b4: pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam pal rigs kyi bu bden smra 'di ni bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed cig na bskal pa gnod par sngo ba'i dgra med pa zhes bya ba
93b5: la 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /
93b6: 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can zhes bya ba de ni bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i ra ba 'bum phrag bdun gyis
93b7: bskor ba/ spos chu'i 'obs 'bum phrag bdun gyis rjes su bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che bai dur+ya chen po 'bum phrag bdun gyi shing thags btsugs pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi dra ba sa ya ngag gis steng nas
93b8: yongs su bkab pa/ nor bu rin po che sa ya dag gis brgyan pi'i rta babs dang ldan pa/ rgyan rin po cho seng ge yid du 'ong ba sa ya dag gis spras pa'i bu shu dang / skar khung dag gis mdzes par byas pa/ nor bu
94a1: rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan sa ya dag gis smras pa'i mkha' rten rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ nor bu rin po je snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sa ya dag gis gcig tu 'bar bar snang bar byas pa/
94a2: dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sa ya dag gis kun nas sgra phyung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lda ldi sa ya dag kun nas mngon par bres pa dang ldan pa nor bu rin po che tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi lha'i ba dan dang /
94a3: rgyal mtshan sa ya bslang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can de ni lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing rin po che'i shing ljon pa dag gis kun du gang bar
94a4: 'gyur te/ de na rtsa skye ba dag 'jam zhing g.yud drung 'khyil pa ltar g.yas su 'khyil la/ rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra zhing ka tsa lin di ka'i gos ltar 'jam pa sha stag gis 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas
94a5: pa'i grags pa cano kun nas yog par 'gyur/ bskyed mos tshal sa ya dag gis brgyan par 'gyur/ bskyed mos tshal re re yang rdzing bu sa ya dag gis legs par brgyan cing kun nas mdzes par 'gyur/
94a6: rdzing bu re re yang stegs brgyad dang bcas pa nor bu rin po che yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas spras pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i
94a7: pad mas kun nas g.yog pa/ ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang / khrung khrung sgra skad 'byin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can de ni grong dang / grong
94a8: khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor sa ya dag gis kun nas brgyan par 'gyur/ grong khyer chen po re re yang grong khyer sa ya dag gis legs par brgyan par 'gyur zhing de
94b1: bzhin du grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang snyed du 'gyur te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor sa ya sa ya thams cad kyang /
94b2: skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo du ma dag gis gang bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bsdus pa'i grags pa can der gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams par ma
94b3: bltan yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ shin du blta na sdug pa/ shin du mdzes pa/ shin du 'byor pa/ shin du rgyas pa/ skyes pa dang / bud med shin du mang bas gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni bcom ldan 'das de
94b4: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de'i skye ba'i grong khyer du 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi
94b5: rgyal po de ni bram ze'i rigs las mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i yum ni shugs ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar nga'i yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul lta bur 'gyur ro// de'i yab na tshangs pa'i dbyig
94b6: ces bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar nga'i yab rgyal po zas gtsang ma lta bur 'gyur ro// de'i sras ni sgra rnam par grags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar nga'i gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin lta bur 'gyur ro// de'i
94b7: btsun me dam pa ni blo gros chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar nga'i shAkya'i bu mos 'tshe ma lta bur 'gyur ro// de'i ma ma ni grags pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de ltar nga'i skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gi
94b8: ta ma lta bur 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i rim gro pa ni rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar nga'i rim gro pa 'dun pa lta bur 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gos kyi tog
95a1: gi rgyal po de gang la bcibs te/ mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rta'i rgyal po de ni shugs can ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar da'i rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan lta bur 'gyur ro// bcom
95a2: ldan 'das de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ der de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
95a3: byang chub kyi snying po de ni byang chub kyi shing 'bum phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dris na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang
95a4: g i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gyi ris
95a5: gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / phegs thogs shing byang chub kyi snying po chos kyis 'phags pa ga la ba der
95a6: dong ste/ glu dang rol mo sna tshogs byed par 'gyur ro// 'og min res kyi mthar thug pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyang der 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci
95a7: dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs phal mo che 'ang dar 'du bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dag nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs shin du mad ba 'du bar 'gyur ro//
95a8: 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyis tog gi rgyal po de thog ma mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'dus pa'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par
95b1: 'phrul ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po mdo sde bya ba 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa ston par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po des chos kyi
95b2: rnam grangs de bstan pa'i sems de bstan pa'i tshe sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bden
95b3: pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de chos ston pa ni theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pas mi ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dga' byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
95b4: sems can thams cad kyang theg pa gcig la mos pa rgya chen po la mos pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de'i
95b5: 'dus pa dang po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gyur ro/ / 'dus pa gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad cur
95b6: 'gyur ro/ / 'dus pa gsum pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag drug bcur 'gyur te/ de phyin chad sems can grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
95b7: mi ldog pa la 'god par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa drug nur 'gyur ro// de yongs su mya ngan las
95b8: 'das nas kyang le bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cur dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro/ / dam pa'i chos rgyas par sems can de snyed 'dul bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa
96a1: d e gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tog chen po zhes bya ba 'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
96a2: par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bkod pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' tog chen po zhes bya ba lung
96a3: bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' tog chen po zhes bya ba 'byung zhing / bcom ldan 'das
96a4: de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
96a5: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur ba de gang zhig yin snyam du ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i
96a6: sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu bden smra 'di'i mdun du bram ze'i khye'u bden dga' zhes bya ba
96a7: 'dug pa bram ze'i byis pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu bya ba 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ ngo
96a8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i che ba
96b1: de thos nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab ste/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
96b2: g shegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar
96b3: shog shig ces smon lam btab par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to// de nas gcer bu pa 'bum phrag brgyad bcu pa de
96b4: ngag gis kyang tshig 'thun par smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi
96b5: zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/ / de nas steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcus 'di skad kyi tshig brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de
96b6: bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de byang chub brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can der skye bar gyur cig/ yon tan bkod
96b7: pa bsam gyis mi khyad pa de yang mthong bar shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag khyed cig kyang 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i
96b8: grags pa can der skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu khyed kyang 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can de nyid du bla na med pa yang
97a1: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur la tshe'i tshad ni 'thun par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi
97a2: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sa'i 'og nas pad ma 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar gyi mdab ma can nor bu rin po che chen po an d+ha rnyil gyi ze ba'i tshogs can/ spug gi snying po dang
97a3: ldan pa/ / nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i chub can/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis sa gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'phags te/ pad ma de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dkyil mo
97a4: krung du 'khod pa mtshan dang de bo byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba snang bar gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dra ba dag gis bcom
97a5: ldan 'das la mngon par bkab nas 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'jig rten gzhan dang gzhan gyi khams nas de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam
97a6: gyis mi khyab pa bka' stsal pa 'da'ang nyan/ bcom ldan 'das la yang blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang // bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / rigs kyi bu bden smra 'di dang 'khor 'dus pa 'di yang blta ba'i slad du 'dir
97a7: mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
97a8: las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe don 'di nyid shin du gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rtse gcig sems su dbang po mnyam zhog ste//
97b1: daring ngas spras 'di don mnyan par gyis// de bzhin gshegs la brdzun gyi tshig mi mnga'// bde gshegs rangadabyung tshig ni gzhan du min// skye bo de dga' bden smra 'di nyid ni// dag cing dri meng gnod med bskal pa la/
97b2: bskal pa grangs med mang pos 'jig rten du// 'tshang rgya bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal// nyon mongs gnod pa de la mi 'byung ste// de phyir bskal pa de ni gnod med pa// 'jig rten ming yang rnam par bltas pa ste/
97b3: bskal pa de ni dpal gyi phung por 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa de yi bskal pa de// lha mi rnams kyis blta ba'i 'os 'gyur te// rin chen tshogs kyi 'obs dang rta babs rnams// nyams dga' kun nas shin du mdzes par
97b4: 'gyur/ / 'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi dra bas g.yogs// chos kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba bsgrags// seng ge'i rgyal mtshan rab rnams rtag du bsgreng // rin chen tshogs kyi lde ldi brgya dag sbyangs// rtseg pa'i rgyud ni rin chen
97b5: dri med de/ / de ni lha yi khyim dang 'dra bar 'gyur// mtshe'u dang lu ma pad mi'i mtsho dag gis// de ni rtag tu legs par brgyan par 'gyur// de yi chu dang pad ma ud pa la dang // pad ma dkar po dag gis kun khebs
97b6: 'gyur/ / gling bzhi pa yi 'jig rten par mdo// ming ni blta na sdug cing yid 'ong ste// de ni bde gshegs de yi skye ba yis// rang byung de ni bram ze'i rigs las 'byung // thub pa'i yum ni shugs dang ldan zhes bya// yab
97b7: ni tshangs pa'i dbyig ces bya bar 'gyur/ / de yi bu ni rnam grags sgra zhes bya// dper na nga'i bu sgra gcan zin 'di 'dra// bde gshegs de yi btsun mo dam pa ni// blo gros chen mo nga yis 'tsho bzhin// de yi ma ma yid ni
97b8: grags chen te/ / nga yi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo bzhin// thub pa'i rim gro byed pa'i sems can 'phags// rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhes bya ba ste// nga yi rim gro 'dun pa gus ldan bzhin// de ni 'dren pa de la rim gro byed//
98a1: thub pa de yi rta mchog 'gyur ba yi// shugs can zhes bya'i ming dang ldan 'gyur te// bde gshegs mngon par 'byung che ba cibs par 'gyur// nga yi rta mchog bsngags ldan gyur pa bzhin// bde
98a2: gshegs de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing / / chos kyi 'phags shes bya ba de tshe 'byung // shing mchog brgya phrag stong du bsgyur ba yi// phrag ni brgyad bcu dag gis de bskor 'gyur// shing mchog de drung kye ma chos
98a3: gyis rgyal/ / rang byung zla med bden zhes bya ba zhugs nas// bla na med pa'i byang chub rabazhi pa// mya ngan med pa mngon par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// de na bdud med bdud kyi phyogs kyang med// bdud kyi las kyang der 'byung mi
98a4: 'gyur ro/ / rgyal ba thub pa gang zag zla med pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni gnod sde med par 'gyur// mi dang lha tshogs mang po 'du 'gyur te// rnam dag shin du sbyangs bde tshe 'byung // de kun me tog phreng bgos dang glu//
98a5: rol mo sgra yis bde gshegs drud 'dod 'gyur// rgyal bas de dag bsam mkhyen mdo sde 'di// mdo gzhan lhan cig drang srong gsung bar 'gyur// rgyal ba des ni rab tu gsungs pa yi// mdo sde khyad par 'phags pa 'di
98a6: thos nas/ / sems can dpag yas gang gA'i bye ma snyed// thub dbang byang chub mchog tu mi ldog 'gyur// theg pa dman pa der 'byung mi 'gyur te// rang rgyal theg pa'ang zhing der 'byung mi 'gyur// rgyal ba de yi sangs
98a7: rgyas zhing mchog der/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'byung kun dpa' zhing 'dzangs// rkang gnyis mchog de'i 'dus pa dang por ni// rgyal sras grags pa'i 'od ldan gang 'byung ba// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog/
98a8: rnam dag gang gA'i rdul bas mang ba'i byung // blo bzang ldan pa'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni// skye ba gcig gnas khrag khrig brgyad bcu 'byung // 'dus pa gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mchog/ dkrigs phrag drug bcu dag
98b1: ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i tshe'i chang 'gyur ba// bskal pa bar ma jug bcu chang ba ste// rgyal bde ni mya ngan 'das gyur nas// mi yi 'dren pa'i ches kyi sgron ma yang // lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag ni/
98b2: brgyad bcu tham par gnas par 'gyur ba yin// rang gi sku gdung ring srel rgyas mdzad cing // de ni gdul bar rab mang 'dul bar 'gyur// drang srong che byang chub sems dpa' ni// tog chen lung bstan mdzad nas myang ngan nga
98b3: 'di ni bkod chen zhes bya'i thub dbang 'gyur/ / rgyal bdagra las rgyal bar 'di 'gyur ro// rgyal ba de yi zhing bkod 'di 'dra ste// 'jig rten phan par mdzad pa 'di bzhin no// rgyal ba'i byang chub mnyam med dri med pa// raba'i rdzogs
98b4: pa'i sangs rgyas mgon por 'gyur/ / de yi mkhyen pa de 'dran ma mkha'i tshad// bskal pa 'byung ba mang po rab tu shes// 'das pa lo shes da ltar ci zhig sems// ye shes kun du thogs pa med pa mnga'// nga yi tshig ni dag cing
98b5: brdzun med de/ / brdzun du mi smra don dam bden pa la// dag nas nas ni nam yang mi smra'o// ji skad gsungs pa'i 'di la yid ches bgyis// drang srong chen po'i gsung 'di thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams kun kyang dga' ba'i sems//
98b6: gyur te// de tshe khams der skye bar shog shig ces// zhing mchog der sbyar dad pas smon lam btab// 'jig rten khams mchog der ni skye 'gyur te// 'jig rten 'dren pas de dag lung bstan te// der ni khyed kyis bde
98b7: gshegs thob gyur nas/ / gun kyang sems can don med byed par 'gyur// mdo sde rgyal po 'di bstan de'i tshe// sa chen 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' pad mar gnas pa dag/ de tshe thal sbyar
98b8: thub la 'di skad gsel/ / khyod kyis chos tshul dam pa 'di gsungs pa// thub pa zla med rang bzhin shin du legs// chos kyi tshul rab dam pa mnyan pa dang // rgyal ba'i chos 'tshal bdag cag 'dir mchis lags// de nas
99a1: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshim zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs la rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas gos re re bzhag ste/ gos gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas
99a2: tshi ga 'di skad kyang smras te/ kye ma 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa byung bar gyur te/ dang po ni grong khyer bar ni ser bskor to// chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de ring 'dir bskor to//
99a3: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos rin po che 'di dang mi 'bral zhing skyes bu dam pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar shog shig ces smon lam btab po// steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga chen po dag sgra
99a4: mngon par 'byin par gyur to/ / lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po'i char chen po yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du mngon par bab par gyur to// steng gi bar snang la yang lha
99a5: rnams kyis lha'i gos dag g.yab mo thabs su bskor te/ tshig 'di skad kyang brjod par gyur to// skyes bu dam pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag ni yon
99a6: tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
99a7: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / glegs bam du bgyis shing 'chang ba na/ bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig 'phel
99a8: bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
99b1: skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes can ma yin pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams na
99b2: sems can ji snyed cig yod pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur
99b3: la de dag thams cad la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bskal par gnas pa'i tshe bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas/ bla mar byas// sti stang du byas/ mchod pa byas na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji
99b4: snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags te/ 'di ltar bgrang ba 'am/ brtsi
99b5: bar yang sla ba ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bas kyang gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston tam/
99b6: glegs bam du bris te 'chang dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung 'bog pa de bsod nams mang du skyed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal
99b7: gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad la sman pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa ngo mtshar lags so//
99b8: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring po ji srid cig tu 'dzam bu'i gling na mchis par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das nas gang gi
100a1: rgyal po brgyad kyis nga'i ring srel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir brgyad du bgos nas za ma tog brkyang du bcug ste/ rang rang gi yul du mchod rten gyi khang pa yangs par 'jog par 'gyur te/ rgyal
100a2: po ma skyes dgras ni de'i ring bsrel rnams las brgyad cha blangs nas rin po che'i za ma tog tu bcug ste/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi rol dus brkos nas ring sel la bog sdong kha gab bcad nas
100a3: spos kyis ni bdugs/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ni btsugs/ rin po che'i me tog ni gtor/ lo brgyar byin gyis brlabs pa'i mar me'i me lce gcig tu 'bar ba ni bus shing ring srel gyi za ma tog 'jog par
100a4: 'gyur/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bsdang ba'i phyir mdo'i rgyal po 'di gser gyi glegs ba ma la bris nas ring srel gyi za ma tog de nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ rgyal
100a5: po mya ngan med pa de ni mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni mau'u r+ya'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba/ mthu dang brtson pa thob pa/ stobs kyi 'khor los
100a6: skur bar 'gyur te/ de nga'i rnam pa las rjes su dran par byed par 'gyur ro// nga'i bstan pa la yang dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dbang po bde ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/
100a7: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ shin du rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/ rgyal po'i rigs las rab tu byung ba/ rgyal po mya ngan med pas bkur ba/ grong du 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam
100a8: dpal de ltar rgyal po mya ngan med pa des nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir skye bo mang pos yongs su bskor cing bskod pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos me tog brang ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang
100b1: byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / phe ga thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song nas mchod pa ri cho ga mngon par 'du bya ba chen po byas te/ sa'i phyogs de nas ring sral gyi za ma tog de byung nas/ nyi ma bdun
100b2: gyi bar du spos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / me tog phreng thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / sil snyan thams cad dang / pheg rdob pa dang / gla dbyangs thams cad
100b3: kyis mchod pa rnam pa du ma byas te/ skar ma dang / sbyor ba dang ldan pa gcig la yul sna tshogs su chos kyi rgyal pos byas pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong byed par 'gyur ro// de'i chos smra ba dbang po bde bas chos
100b4: kyi rnam grangs 'di ring srel gyi za ma tog nas byung nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi yul chen por 'jog par 'gyur te/ skye bo mang pos shes par mi 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos rig par mi 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos
100b5: yongs su bzung bar mi 'gyur la chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin pa nyung ba dang / klog par nyung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rtag tu sgom du bcug pa dang / snod du bcug par 'gyur ro// de
100b6: ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos tshol ba med cing snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mos par dka' zhing yid ches par dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ba ste/ dmun sbrul du mngon par
100b7: yid ches pa'am/ 'jug par mi nus so// 'jam dpal phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la la dag gis thos te/ yid ches par gyur tam/ tshol lam rtog
100b8: na de dag ni 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ legs par spyod pa spyad pa/ theg pa chen po 'di'i snod du gyur par nges par rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
101a1: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / glegs pam du byas shing 'chang ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang bdag cag gis ni sngon de bzhin
101a2: gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong bar gyur to/ / mnyes par byas so// bsnyen bkur byas so zhes bya ba dang / de dag gis ni nga yang bskyed mos tshal 'di na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa dang / 'khor
101a3: 'dus pa 'di yang mthong ngo zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig/ zung shig/ kun
101a4: chub par gyis shig/ dbang po rnon po rnams ma gtogs par ga bab bab kyi mdun du ma ston cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsad pa yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
101a5: gsad chen yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar med pa'i chos bstan pa yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya yin pa dang / 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba bsgom pa yin pa dang /
101a6: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter gyi mchog yin pa'i phyir te/ kun dga' bo de bas na nga'i bu thu bo chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ chos kyi mdzod srung ba de dag la sbyin par bya ba ma gtogs par 'di ni shin du sba bar bya
101a7: zhing su la'ang sbyin par mi bya'o/ / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'dir
101a8: ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes
101b1: bya bar zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsar ba'i gnas shes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar med pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul zhes bya ba dang / theg pa
101b2: gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis yongs su dris pa zhes bya ba dang / bden spa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / bden spyi'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan
101b3: pa'i tshe/ srog chags khrag khrig phrag sum bcu sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa las sems skyes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' drug khris ni mi skye ba'i chos
101b4: la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / sems can tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan
101b5: bkun dga' bo dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
101b6: dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyod pa rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
101b7: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / lung bstan pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyis yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa
101b8: zhes bya ba theg pa chen po ma do rdzogs s+ho/ / rgyagar gyi ma khan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsham pa na de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur ci nus te gtan la paba'o// na gnyis nug phyis shin tu dag par skadams nus shing ba du mdag mang po bcos 'dug pa dbacos pa zhag/
102a1: rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru NA ni de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/
102a2: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i re sden rgyal ba gzugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
102a3: gyi rlabs kyis brlabs pa sa'i snying po/ / byang chub sems dpa' mngon par bstod pa/ chos kyi gdan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyis phyag byas pa'i sa phyogs/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba/ de bzhin gshegs
102a4: pa 'byung ba chos kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba/ yon tan tshad med pa las yang dag par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs
102a5: par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin du bskor/ slob ma shin du dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mda'/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa ni legs par mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i
102a6: pha rol du phyin pa ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i gnas par 'joms pa la ni mkhas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun mi 'chad cing dge slong stong phrag drug bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
102a7: chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems
102a8: shan du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshes kyi rgyal po'i sras/ tshes zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/
102b1: dmigs pa med pa'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin du zhugs pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu
102b2: med pa dang yang thabs gcig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa'i snod yul gyis nges par byung ga thams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pomams kyi sbyin las lhag mamed dang / rig pa
102b3: dang / rnam par grol ba'i klog phung zhing bdud rtsi'i chu'i rgyun gyi char 'bebs pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la sems sa dang mnyams/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
102b4: chos sna tshogs kyi lo thog yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong bas gti mug gi mun pa sel ba'i lam gyi snang ba thob pa kun du ston pa dang / sems can gyi pad ma
102b5: 'byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sred pa'i chu skems pa dang / shes pa'i las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jog pa la mngon par shes pa chen po dang / zhi gnas kyis rgyu ba/ zla ba lta bur 'gro ba thams cad la sems
102b6: mnyam pas mngon par zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pas 'grib pa dang 'phel ba kun du ston pa/ ri rab lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pas tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rin po che shin du brtan te/ dos bzhi nas
102b7: yul gyi rlung thams cad kyis mi sprul cing 'jig rten gyi chos las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun du bstan pa snang bar gyur pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar gzungs dang dran pa'i snod rgya chen po chos kyi chus
102b8: yongs su gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rin po ches 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po ltar bden pa'i rkang pa dang / byams pa rab tu 'phel ba'i mjug ma dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi
103a1: mig dang ldan zhing chos zab mo la skrag pa med pas pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med cing mtha' yas thug pa med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pas yon tan
103a2: thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrib pa med par lta ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhing thams cad kyi rgyun
103a3: dkod pa kun du ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i spyod pa'i bla gros shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad lam thams cad kyis
103a4: 'dul ba mi 'khrugs pa'i kun du ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
103a5: gser bzang po bsags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rnam par nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod
103a6: nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang
103a7: chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'dug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyis rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu drug bzhes te/
103a8: tshangs par spyod pa rgyas par gyur par mkhyen/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de yang gzigs shing mkhyen te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen
103b1: nas 'di snyam du gang gi phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgya cher rjes su yongs su gzud ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin
103b2: gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par
103b3: bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so//
103b4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar
103b5: snang la 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi bar du 'khor gyi khyams/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su spyod pa/ phyogs bcu'i
103b6: 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsam pa tshim par byed pa/ lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul pa/ gzhi bai dUr+ya dkar po'i
103b7: dbyings dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi khang pa dag dang dpal gyi snying po'i rta babs dag dang / rin po che rdo'i snying po'i sgo yang dag dang / nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i kha khyer dag dang / rin po che dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi stegs bu dag dang / rin po
103b8: tshe kun nas 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dgab pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan phre nga rab tu sbyangs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba dang / lha'i dar gyi lda ldi mngon par sbyangs pas bsngags pa bstan pa
104a1: dpag tu med cing thug pa med pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byung ste/ 'khor gyi khyams de yang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos bskus pa/ tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dri yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/
104a2: dri'i mchog a ga ru dam pa'i snying pos bdugs pa/ klu'i mu tig dang rin po che'i me tog gis rnam par sbas pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ rin po che'i shing dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten gyis mdzes par byas pa ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
104a3: gyi khams thams cad na rgyan mdzes pa bkod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de nyid na kun du snad do/ / der seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ sna tshogs pa/ blta na sdug pa
104a4: mtho ba/ rab tu bzad pa/ yangs pa rgya che ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa dag byung bar gyur to// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thes skas kha khyer mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyis bskor ba/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed kyis yongs su
104a5: bzung ba/ rin po che an da rnyil dang / mthon kha chen pos snying por gyur pa/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i gdugs can/ tshangs pa'i ne tso 'am ci dang / rin po che ser pos spras pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba kun tu
104a6: bstod pas sgra 'byung ba/ sa'i steng nas 'khor gyi khyams la thug gi bar du gyen du mngon par 'phags pa/ drang ba ma yo ba bzhi sto byung par gyur to// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
104a7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang de lta bu'i them skas chen po dag byung bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par
104a8: gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i
104b1: tshogs dang thabs gcig/ nyan thos kyi tshogs dang thabs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis mdun du btar te/ lha dang / klus mngon par bstod cing me tog gi char
104b2: chen po ni 'bebs/ na bza'i char chen pos ni mngon par 'gebs/ phyes dang / spos dang / byug pa'i char chen po ni 'thor/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs chen po ni rab tu sgrogs/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa ni rab tu
104b3: g.yo bar mdzad/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa ni snang bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa
104b4: chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te/ lha dang /
104b5: klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag du sa zham 'brang du khrang zhing nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi thes skas kyi dbus nas 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa
104b6: ga la ba der gshegs so/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i me tog gi
104b7: sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ nyi tha me dang nor bu'i 'od dang lha yul ba yi lha 'od shin du dri med pa// thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan nas ngan song gsum
104b8: po dag kyang zhi bar mdzad/ / ri bo lhun po dang ni kho ra khor yug rtse mo brnyil te zhing rnams gsal bar gyur pas na// dga' zhing yid rnams mgu nas don rnams thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba la na skabs su mchi// de nas
105a1: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zham 'bring du 'brang ngo / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum bcu
105a2: rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon parla stod pa/ rdzu
105a3: 'phrul dam pa brnyes shing rab tu mtshungs pa med pa rnam par 'phrul pa shin du ston/ rgyal nyi ma ji bzhin 'phags te zhing rnams bye ba brgya dag tu yang rab tu gda'// rgyal bas rang gi yon tan kun gyis zhing rnams thams cad
105a4: brgyan te shin du mdzes mdzad pa/ / gang zhig shin du mnyam med mtshungs pa med cing rdzu 'phrul dbang du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis
105a5: mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zham bring du 'brang ngo / / de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod
105a6: pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i na bza'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ / bde gshegs khyod kyi mkhyen pa mtha' yas yangs pas sems can bsam pa mkhyen// mkha' 'dra'i
105a7: lam gyi chos gsum dag la chags med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ / sems kyi 'jug pa gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems kyi spyod pa thams cad mkhyen// des na srid pa gsum po dag na lus can rnams kyis mchod par 'os
105a8: de nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zham khring du 'brang bar gyur to/ / de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan 'asogs pa dga' ldan gyi
105b1: lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gang gi slad du/
105b2: sgra dang yi ge ma mchis gang du'ang rgyu ba ma mchis pas// khyod kyis chos rnams mi g.yo ya ma brla dang sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar mkhyen nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos mchog gsungs
105b3: pas na/ chos kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin mkhas pa bdag med gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan
105b4: 'das kyi zham khring du 'brang ngo / / de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rgyan gyi sprin
105b5: gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// chos kyi zong gis rang gi stobs bcu mkha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang // thugs rje brnyes nas byams pa'i dgongs pas
105b6: sems can rnams la gzugs ston pa/ / gru tshul tshes la gnyis su med par zhugs kyang rgyal ba mtshungs par mkhyen// chos kyi khyad par sems lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'phrul dga'i lha
105b7: rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nam khring du 'brang bar gyur to/ / de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis
105b8: bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs pa dang 'khor gyi khyams su mngon par phyogs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ mu tig gi do shal gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan
106a1: 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam dag rnam par nges pa dam pa ting nge 'dzin mchog mi g.yos pa// mnyam med blo ldan rgya mtsho 'dra bar gnas shid srid
106a2: las rnam grol dbang sgyur zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rim gyis byams ldan pa'i thugs rje yis ni bden pa'i lam gyi rnam pa rab tu gnas mdzad pa// rnam thar gsum gyi lam gyi khyim na gnas pa'i bde gshegs seng ge khyod
106a3: la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ / snying rje'i chu bo ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam 'phel ba// zhi ga nas mdab ma rnam par grol ba'i me tog rgyas// slob ma'i tshogs kyi bung bas nges par bsnyen gyur pa// bde gshegs pad ma la ni spyi bos
106a4: phyag 'tshal lo/ / mnga' bdag g.yo ba ma mchis tshul khrims sar gnas pas// brtson 'grus mtshungs pa ma mchis stobs kyis yang dag 'phags// yul gyi rlung rnams langs pa chen pos mi g.yos pa// sangs rgyas
106a5: ri bo dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / mnga' bdag thugs rjes dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// blo gter blo mchog gis ni rab tu 'joms mdzad pa// sems can brgya dag gis ni mang pos mchod gyur pa// bde gshegs zla
106a6: bakhyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ / mkha' ltar zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa'i lam gshegs pa// shes rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing // skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad mkha' byed pa// sangs rgyas nyi ma dam
106a7: pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / mnga' bdag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na yang // 'dren pa khyod dang mnyam pa dmigs par ma gyur te// khyod ni yon tan kun gyis yang dag gyur pa lags// bdag cag khyod la
106a8: bstod pas ngoms par 'gyur ma lags/ / lha dbang klu dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis pa// lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang dag mngon bstod pa// bsngags pa brgya phrag mang po yang dag mngon bstod pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
106b1: bstod 'od khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'brang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das
106b2: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa tshad med pa lha 'bum gyis mngon par bstod nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir them
106b3: skas nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs pa shes pa de bzhin du/ stod gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gshegs par shes so// de nas bcom
106b4: ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams stong gsum gyis yongs su gzung ba rin po che bkod par gdan seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po dag kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod par
106b5: gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam
106b6: par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
106b7: snyed byung ste/ byung nas kyang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi
106b8: khams thams cad snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byas ma thag tu/ de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba rgyun chad do// dud
107a1: 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyun chad do// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par
107a2: ma gyur cing / zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang gnod par ma gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur to// byang chub sems
107a3: dpa' yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / / gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni mtha' yas yangs pa brtan pa brtsams gyur te// gang gis brtson
107a4: 'grus chen po'i stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs spangs/ / gang gi yon tan dag ni phyogs bcu rnams na mthu ldan rab brjod pa// shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa mdzes// gang chos rgya chen
107a5: med mnyan slad de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ / mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyan// blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pachi ma skyed pa// thub pa des ni gang phyir sems
107a6: can bde bar bzhed pas 'od 'di byung / / mnga' bdag gang zhig brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs bcas pham mdzad nas// pad ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun po ji bzhin mdzes//
107a7: gang shig nyi ma bzhin du sku'i 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa// de yi chos kyi 'khor lo gzhag pa don chen gsan du rgyal ba gshegs su gsol// rab tu bskor bar mgur mtshungs pa med cing rgyal ba kun gyis bskor
107a8: gyur pa/ / 'khor lo dam po stobs bcu sems can thugs rtse phyir ni de ring skor ba mdzad// srog chags rnams kyis bsten par rnyed dka' legs pa rgya chen de reng 'byung bar 'gyur// gang dag dad pa dad pa ched yang sa don du
107b1: gnyer ba de dag de ring ltos/ / de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis go bar byas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
107b2: rab tu g.yo bar byas/ sems can thams cad bde bar byas/ nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs// mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas byang chub sems
107b3: dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam dag rin chen 'od byang chub
107b4: kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i bsod nams bkod pas rgya che ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub
107b5: sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs
107b6: rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das
107b7: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i nor bu bai dUr+ya dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
107b8: mngon par bstod do/ / bcom ldan rab tu mtshungs med yon tan pha rol phyin// khyed kyi yon tan bsngags 'phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs mchis zhing gang yon tan gter// der ni chos
108a1: don gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchi/ / chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam tog ma mchis ji bzhin du// bcom ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang // shin du bslabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi
108a2: rgyal/ / sems can rnam par dgrol slad tha dang bstan pa mdzad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar
108a3: phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
108a4: rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
108a5: bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkong par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
108a6: 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing gser gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/
108a7: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan thugs rje'i sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkad nas// 'od kyi glog phyung stong pa bdag med sgra bsgrags te/ yan lag brgyad pa'i
108a8: lam gyi chu yis zhi mdzad cing / / dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal gel ba 'phel bar mdzad// bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug mun bsal nas// ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sad mdzad de/
108b1: lam yang bstan cing sred pa dag kyang skams par mdzad// thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam par spyod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' bstod pa tshad med padag gis bcom
108b2: ldan 'das la mngon par bstang nas/ lho phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs
108b3: rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyis rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yong
108b4: su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zheng de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom
108b5: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu mu tig gi do
108b6: shal gyi phreng ba'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// khyod kyi sku yi phrin las nam mkha'i khams 'dra zhing // smon lam
108b7: dge bas dag pa bye ba phrag mang ldan/ / dri med rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyam zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// khyod kyi tshig ni rgyun chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa ste// 'gro ba bsam
108b8: pa mnyam nyid yongasatshim bgyid/ / sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang mi mnga' yang // sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa
109a1: tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas nub phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas byang phyogs na bzhin
109a2: g shegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa na byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskal ma thag tu byang
109a3: chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad
109a4: 'dir byin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor bar byas nas bcom ldan
109a5: 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu'i do shal dang rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// 'dzam bu'i chu gser bcom lta
109a6: bur ser ba'i sku/ / kun nas spyan mda' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes// mtshungs med sku la sems can gang dag ngas rtog pa// de dag skyon med bde zhing dga' ba thob par 'gyur// gang gis lhun po brtsegs pa lta bu'i khrun
109a7: tsam du/ / 'jig rten mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal ba bltas kyang ni// de yi rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi// rnam par sprul pas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub
109a8: sems dpa'i stod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas byang phyogs logs su gnas te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ / de nas shar dang lho'i mtshams
109b1: phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang
109b2: gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi
109b3: khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
109b4: las byed cing rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// spa yis mtha' dpung ma mchis pa yi zhing 'dzin kyang // sems
109b5: can rnams la mi gnod zhing la mi gnod pas/ / mig med rnams kyis rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar dka'// sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal// zhing cig phyogs la zhing mngarab 'jam ston
109b6: mdzad de/ / kun du bstan kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis// bsam pa chen po dag ldan ci 'drar gyur de la// dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems
109b7: dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phral gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dgal 'khod do// de nas
109b8: dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mig bzang po na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po
110a1: sems pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i byem snyad kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad
110a2: cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byin te 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
110a3: la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing na bza'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// sems can
110a4: dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du/ / tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung // tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shin du thugs rje zhing // bdag la bstod pa mi mdzad gzhan la smod mi mdzad// lhun po ji bzhin khyod
110a5: brtan bla ma rgya chen sten/ / chu gter zab mo bzhin du shin du gting dpag dka'// srid pa thog mar bcings pa kun nas grol ba ste// sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol// de nas byang chub sems
110a6: dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag
110a7: la 'khod do/ / de nas nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang bral ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can zhes bya ba'o
110a8: des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bangar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig/ thang cig yud tsam de la
110b1: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdapa de phyin te/ 'khar tha byams ngan par bka par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas das bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs lam gapas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan thabs
110b2: babyas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyi drabs bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de// srid pa'i rang bzhin
110b3: ma'i rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas/ / byed pa sgyu ma lta bu dngos po med par ston// sgyu ma lta bu sems can khams ni 'dul mdzad kyang // 'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis khams ma mchis// dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis
110b4: log pa'i rmi lam na/ / gzugs mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma lags// 'dus byas dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsung // chos rnams snang yang 'di na chos la chags ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems
110b5: dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rngu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i nga rang
110b6: gi stan dag la 'khod do/ / de nas byang dang shar gyi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil dri ma med pa rnam par sems pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag dri ma med par rab tu gnas
110b7: pan byang chub sems dpa' tha mtha' yas dri med ces bya ba 'od das bskul ma thag byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i byem snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun dra bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi nang
110b8: de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi
111a1: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rtag tu sgra 'byung ba'i sil snyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
111a2: bka' ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing rab tu zhil mos// khyed kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen// khyod kyi thugs kyi dgangs pa
111a3: 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal/ / mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyi bsam pa chog mkhyen// sems can gcig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod// gang dag dus gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen// sems can 'du shes
111a4: mi 'jug sems kyi 'du shes min/ / 'du shes yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
111a5: par bstod nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yud pal dmar pa'i
111a6: dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed du snang ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed
111a7: kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par
111a8: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu rin po che'i
111b1: gling gi phreng gi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gal te khrag khrig zhing na ji snyed rdul mchis pa// de snyed bde gshegs sras
111b2: mo rgyal ba'i drang lhags te/ / bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus pa dag/ de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go bar mdzad// sgrol mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin du rdzogs// gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs
111b3: bsod nams mtha' yas te/ bskal pa mang po mtha' yas bsngags pa rab brjod kyang // skra rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa
111b4: dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
111b5: pa snga bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyis brgyan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub
111b6: sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du ba dar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
111b7: 'dir phyin te/ 'khar gyi khyams rin pa che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag bes phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khribaskong ba byas nas
111b8: bcom ldan 'das la mdzad pa'i las byed cing rgyan thams cad bkad pa dang / rin po che'i dril bu ga yer ka'i drabs bcom ldan 'das la mngan par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan
112a1: la mngon par bsnyad do/ / bde gshegs su 'phrin las mtha' dang dpung ma mchis// bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul mtha' yas pa// dan sangs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min// dper na/
112a2: nam mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos ma rnyed bzhin// mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dpung med pa ji bzhin du// byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'on te mya ngan 'das// sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin phyogs bcur
112a3: rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshad ma mchis/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i stod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas steng gi bar snang la dong ste/ rang gi rje
112a4: 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dgal 'khod do/ / de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chad med pa dag 'di des bskul pathag tu
112a5: skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen
112a6: bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra mdzad nas/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
112a7: rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gsal ba'i sgrar
112a8: thos nas lus dang sems tshim par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them skas dag nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
112b1: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu ji ltar 'thun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do/ / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor/
112b2: dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med par
112b3: sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin du mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom
112b4: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan rab tu brtan pa dag la 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mkhyen nas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas byang chub sems dpal
112b5: stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ des thams cad dang lda pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
112b6: byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'od des reg ma thag tu/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms
112b7: par zhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe
112b8: 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du shing ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu tsam du mtho ba/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ kha khyer
113a1: rgyan thams cad las byas pa/ ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba/ me tog sel ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag
113a2: par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji bzhin du ston pa/ bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po
113a3: chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yas shes bya ba mngon par sprul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs
113a4: te/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid// lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum bcu rtsa gsum
113a5: dga'/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di// chos rnams mi g.yo nam mkha'i rang bzhin ya ma brla// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra
113a6: ning / / rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par// mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni rnam par sgrub pa ston// bkod pa'i sems kyi dbang 'gro sems ni gzugs can min// rnam sgrub thams cad sems kyi rang gi dbang du 'gro// ba
113a7: thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra/ / rnam sgrub bdag gis ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis// gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dga' tshal ba// de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so//
113a8: rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba// de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston// sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang // sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun du bstan// gdanag
113b1: bshags nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ / khyed kyi seng ge'i khrigadan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis// gdags dang rgyal mtshan mchog dang dar gyi phreng ba basbed// de ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'od ma mchis/
113b2: khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'dra ba mkhyen nas kyang // sems can dam pa rnam par 'phral pa sna tshogs stor// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin du bsrungs pa'i gsung // 'jig rten smon ma mdzad pa bsod
113b3: nams gzi brjid mang / / bdag la thugs brtse'i slad du 'dzegs te gdan la bzhugs// rgadang 'chi dang na ba cod pa'i chos bshad gsol// khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan skad du// rnam dag sems can
113b4: 'di rnams phyogs bcud dag nas lhags/ / gang ga don du lhags pa'i don de sul du gsol// seng ge'i khril bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal
113b5: kyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bsnyes nas byang chub sems dpa'i spong
113b6: ba la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba slob pa med pa'i 'o zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / me
113b7: 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la dbab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor
113b8: 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo mi skye ba'i chos ston pa/ theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ga chos kyi
114a1: dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa snying po dang ldan pa chos rnam par gdon mi zag/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom
114a2: par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thub pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs dang
114a3: ye shes ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges pa ston pa/ rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par
114a4: rtog pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
114a5: mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug go// rang
114a6: sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang / ngag dang / sems rab tu dben par shes pa/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
114a7: yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / bsnyad pa dang / bshad pa dang / klog pa dang / gzung ba dang / rnam
114a8: par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi the tsom thams cad gcad pa dang /
114b1: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so//
114b2: bam po gnyis pa// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan/
114b3: pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags stobs kyi rgyal pos pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
114b4: par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog gi lnga ldi dag dang / me tog gi skon bu rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ me tog gi lda ldi dang / me tog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan
114b5: 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i blo mchog rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
114b6: shugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sprul gyi snying po'i dri byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyis 'od bkon
114b7: pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen
114b8: bo sems pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzums par byin gyis brla / /
115a1: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med kyis chos la mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos
115a2: don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang mos par byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
115a3: zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos brjod pa med
115a4: par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas de'i tshe
115a5: s angs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par byin
115a6: gyis brlabs so/ / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'jom pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang
115a7: chub sems dpa'i bdud rab tu 'joms pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud
115a8: bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te sgur ba myur bar rings thabs su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan
