115b1: 'das kyi spyar sngar 'khod nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnam pa brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa dang bcas shing shas dang bcas
115b2: par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol pa 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems
115b3: dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis mi rtsol bar 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbug
115b4: dbyung ba stsol cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag
115b5: legs so legs so/ / gang gi phyir khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob shig dang / de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro//
115b6: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag
115b7: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal pa brgya bsags pa yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nyi ma'i
115b8: dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to// grogs po dag de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang / ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun na/
116a1: thams cad sel to// grogs po dag dang phyur khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ram gyis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas chos kyi snang ba chen pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems
116a2: dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin
116a3: kyis brlabs pa dang / kun du bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'isgo/ zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i
116a4: le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed par the tsom ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems
116a5: dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/ sems shin du bya bar bgyis te/ dri ma ma mchis pa/ rig pa dang / rnam par grol
116a6: bas snang bar gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol du son pa/ thabs mkhas pa thams cad las des
116a7: par skyes pa/ bdud kyi las dang / rtsod pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/ phas kyis rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa
116a8: la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du son pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes rab tu thob pa byin gyi rlabs
116b1: thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ 'khrul pa
116b2: mamachis par kha na ma thob ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad la mkhas pa/ mi 'am ci dang / bya ka la bing ka dang / khrung khrung gi sgra dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can/ shin du bshes gnyen bgyis
116b3: pas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ brtan zhing shin du gnas la mi g.yo zhing ji skad smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyid pa/
116b4: chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgred par bgyid pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa'i khor yug lta bu/ smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo blta dka' zhing rtogs par
116b5: dka' ba la zhugs pa/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa/ tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gugs pa
116b6: ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad gso
116b7: bar bgyid pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/ snrel zhi'i rgyud dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ gtan
116b8: pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa thams cad la sems pa/ bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa'i g.yul 'dul ba/ gnyen pa lta bur gyur pa/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang /
117a1: rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa/ shin du yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa/ ri lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang /
117a2: ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / smad pa dang / stod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las log pa/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer
117a3: dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa/ pad ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'od mog
117a4: mog por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ chos dkon mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdud mi gcod pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba/
117a5: dang / 'dul ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang / yang dag par ldan pa/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa
117a6: thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la
117a7: bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed pa snyam bgyid do/ / /
117a8: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sbyar ba/ sems
117b1: dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su spyod pa/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul gcig la 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas
117b2: chos la dbang bskur ba/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba/ nges pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i sems can rnabs la snying chen
117b3: bar sgrub pa/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams 'dzud pa/ theg pa gsum la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
117b4: bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag
117b5: gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo mi thog go// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag
117b6: 'di snyam bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re bskyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'chal ba can de dag ni ngo mtshar
117b7: bsnyam bgyid do/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na
117b8: shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya bor nas nor bu 'ching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
118a1: kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi bsnyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
118a2: 'i byang chu sems bskyed pa dang / spyad par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir bcas pa'i/
118a3: byed bu'i 'khor de las sro gachags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum bcus blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i le'u'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang /
118a4: chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas/ e ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni chos don du gnyer ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas
118a5: nges par 'byung ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bshad pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pas spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer skyes bu chen po'i mtshan spyi gtsug nas byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de phyung ma thag
118a6: tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i lus la lan brgyar bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs
118a7: kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i skye gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ / 'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la reg ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos
118a8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chubs pas dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang / sang ge'i khri dang / lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhang de/ lhan no'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhi//
118b1: gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rig nas stan las langs te/ tha gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
118b2: ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yub ni bai dUr+ya/ g.yogs ma ni gser/ snying po ni rin po chen tshe'am ci/ rtsibs ni inar rnyil las byas
118b3: pa mu tig gi do shal rab tu sbyangs pa dar gyi lnga lngas mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba 'khrol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis bzung ba/ rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig
118b4: byin gyis brlabs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs nas me tog gi char yang phab ste/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byung bar
118b5: byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / kun du snang ba kun nas 'od zer can// don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas spyan/ rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas/
118b6: bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun dang ldan// skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni 'od zer byung // zhal yang rnam par spyod zhing 'od mdzad pa// 'dren pa de ni bdag gi lus la yang // lan brgyar bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor ni// mi yi/
118b7: 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pas na// gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran pa dang ba zos spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs// rnam pa stong du khyad par 'phags par gyur// bdag lus rab sim sems ni rnam par dag/ bdag gi zla
118b8: gros dga' mgu mnyam par gyur/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang // spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas mthu chen snyan par bka' ba la// nyams chung dag gis mnyes par
119a1: u0f7f/ babyed mi nus// sangs rgyas gnang nas 'gro kun phan slad du// sangs rgyas la ni zhu bzhu bar 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 'jug dang // 'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gi 'byung ba dang // snang dang nges 'byung
119a2: rnam par sprul pa dang / / dbang bskur ye shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal// theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khong chud cing // mtha' yas rgya che ba yi 'khor lhags dang // gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dag/ de dag phan slad sangs
119a3: rgyas la yang 'u/ / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin du tshar gcad cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin du gzung // bcom ldan phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod// lus can rnams la bshad pa'i dus 'di lags// skyes bu bya mchog
119a4: bakhyen pa mtha' yas pas/ / bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo mi chud// bde gshegs mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpogs pas// mkhas pa yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyimakhyen 'jug dang / ji ltar/
119a5: yun ring nas ni bslabs pa dang // chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po rab brlabs pa// 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshang du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis sa
119a6: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tshad ma mchis te/
119a7: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad mi gtod pa'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don
119a8: 'di'u bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan dag ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na mdzes pa
119b1: lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing the tsom ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi sgo chen po shin du yongs su sbyangs pa rnams
119b2: lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtod par gnas pa
119b3: rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang / legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang / las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma mchis pa rnams lags/
119b4: bcom ldan 'das ce nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tsom dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul las don du 'phags
119b5: par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ni nga rnas par spyod par 'gyur ba dang
119b6: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas blo shin du
119b7: rnam par nges pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi
119b8: dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so// legs so// khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par nges pa thob nas khyod blo rnam par nges pa 'di lta bus
120a1: de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so/ / de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag/
120a2: dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur bangs khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang gyur/
120a3: gi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/
120a4: bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang / shes rab kyi rgyan dang / gzungs kyi rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
120a5: rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la gnod pa mi byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang pa
120a6: sems med pa ni sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan cig go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni
120a7: gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo ba byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum
120a8: gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus rnam par dag pa dang / dag rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyad ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
120b1: lnga ste gang 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang / gang smon pa de yang dag par grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa de 'thob pa dang / gang rtsom pa de nyams 'og tu chung par byed pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims/
120b2: kyirgyud ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgra med pa yin/ shes rab sgyu med pa yin// rnam par grol ba sna med pa yin// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgra med pa yin/ yongs
120b3: su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bla na med pa sgra med pa yin te lnga po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de la chags pa med pa'i tshul
120b4: khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang / / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dren pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir 'dres pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos
120b5: shin du rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir/ sa sre ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i tshul khrims dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pas rang gi dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te
120b6: drug po 'di dag go/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang /
120b7: brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / thabs rnam par dag pa dang / bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
120b8: kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par 'phro ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhod pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
121a1: 'on du 'dzin pa med paphun su mchags pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyas par byed pa phun sumachags pa dang / ngal bathun pa ma chags pa dang / dge ba bshes gnyen mthu bar byed ga/ phun sumatshogs pa sde brgyad pa/
121a2: 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa yin// skrag pa med pa yin/ bsam pa des pa yin/ nye bar zhi ba yin/ bsil ba
121a3: yin/ bcings balhod pa yin/ sems las su rung ba yin/ sems can shes pa yin/ dul ba'is rjes su 'thob pa yin to/ dgu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bcu po'ang/
121a4: dag ste/ bcu ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir lus kyi rgyan dang / ji skad smras pa/ de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag gi rgyan dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang / smon lam
121a5: yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir zhing gi rgyan dang / bsam pa yongs su spyod pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyan dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir skye ba'i rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spong ba la
121a6: rjes su slob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang / nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i
121a7: phyir stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
121a8: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa ste 'di ni gcig go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
121b1: sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / mnyen pa ste gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di
121b2: dgas/ gsum gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sgra me pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / btsas ma med pa ste// gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bya byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di ga ste/ bzhi gang she na/ 'di ltas
121b3: 'dun pas 'grib ma yin par me 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gru ba dang / gti mug gis 'tshwa sa yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma phan par ma 'gro ba ste/ bzhi po 'di dgag/ rigs kyi bu byang chu
121b4: sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/ lnga po de dag gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyad
121b5: dang / the tsom ste/ sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba dang / chos rjes su dran pa
121b6: zhes bya ba dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa ste drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bdun
121b7: po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
121b8: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yam lag dang / btang snyams yang
122a1: dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste bdun po 'di dgag/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin pa rgyan ni brgyad pa 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhon/ 'di la s+ho// 'phags pa'i'o lam yan lag brgyad pa gdang /
122a2: pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang / yang dag pa'i dag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting
122a3: 'dzin te brgyad po 'di dag go/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen pos
122a4: gnas la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtod par gnas nas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtogs pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las
122a5: skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las
122a6: skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong
122a7: la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas
122a8: sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te/
122b1: gnas so// dernam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nya thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par rdur cing / snga chags kyis 'du shes rnams yad la ma byed pas nam mkha' man/
122b2: ma so rnam nas rnamam 'a mtha' yas skye cad rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad dun mamakha' mtha' las skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma pa shes pam 'ayas so snyam nas rnam
122b3: shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci'ang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te/
122b4: gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med du shes me mi skyem ched ngas yang dag
122b5: 'das te/ 'du shes dang tsher rab 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms pa 'jug kyang thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi byed la sngon gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis yang dag par gnas/ sems can rnams kyang
122b6: yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang she na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems
122b7: pa dang / zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog sred pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang / sems dben pa dang / lus shin du sbyangs pa dang / chos
122b8: rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu
123a1: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la the tsom med pa ste/
123a2: 'di ni gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gyod pa dang bral ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi
123a3: byabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gti mug spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang / mun pa mun nagasel ba ste/ gsum po 'di dag go/
123a4: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i
123a5: mngon gsal dang / lam sgom pa'i phyir byin gyi rlabs te/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung
123a6: po yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab mchog gis bsam gtan pa yin pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas rnam
123a7: par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan na
123a8: drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems can
123b1: gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par smin pa la ra ba med pas byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su
123b2: dag pa dang / brag cha la bu'i shes pas dag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgra ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni nyes par spras pa'i
123b3: tshig rnams la khong khro ba spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / bstod pa dang / bsngags pa dang / rjes su chags pa spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag gcod pa dag la chos kyi sku la rab tu rtog pa yongs su dag
123b4: pa'o/ / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'khor ba mi lam lta bur mos pas yongs su mi skyo ba yongs su dag pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i bsam pas bstan pa yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan ma
123b5: thams cad las sgrol bas blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas de la ma chags pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par
123b6: zhen pa med pas lhag mthong yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa skyed pas dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pas
123b7: bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan gyi phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
123b8: dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa
124a1: med par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang sems dben pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po yongs su shes pa dang / stobs rnams kyis bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod
124a2: pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med par shes pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab tu
124a3: kyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shin du zhi ba'i phyir zhig nas shes pa dang / rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang / chos kyi phung po rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes pa dang / nam mkha'
124a4: khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang / / grong stong dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang / bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang / yang
124a5: dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu rtogs pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni dgu pa 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi
124a6: mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dag pas ma 'ongs pa shes pa dang / bar gyi mtha' dag pas da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / rgyu chud mi za bas nges pa rnams shes pa dang / rkyen nye bar bsgrub pas dngos
124a7: po rnams shes pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pas log pa nyid du nges pa rnams shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi
124a8: par/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes
124b1: rab kyi rgyan na ban pa 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / yongs su rtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
124b2: phyir smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa dang / 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang / rkyen gyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir brag cha lta bur shes pa dang /
124b3: chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus byas dag 'dus ma byas kyi
124b4: mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
124b5: dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa brjod pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gnyis pa 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhen
124b6: 'di lta ste/ kun du 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs brkyen ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang / tshig 'bru la
124b7: mkhas pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i tshig dang / rtsub
124b8: pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang / brdzun pa med pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thes pa
125a1: thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas ye shes la rton pa dang / mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas nges pa'i don gyi mang sde la rngon pa dang / gang zag gi sgra thams cad
125a2: las chos nyid la rton pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rton pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji swA
125a3: smras pa/ de bzhin du byed pa dang / bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshig rab tu thob pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / g.yo med pas blang bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / snying rje chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa'i
125a4: chos ston pa dang / snod la mkhas pas byed par chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten shes pas dus su chos ston pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/
125a5: bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang / shugs can gyi spobs pa dang / myur ba'i spobs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang //
125a6: shin du nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste// bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i skad shes pa dang / klu'i skang shes pa
125a7: dang / gnod srid kyi skad shes pa dang / dri za'i skad shes pa dang / lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang / mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa dang / lto phye chen po'i skad shes pa nas sems can thams
125a8: cad kyi bar gyi skad shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gyi nang du spa gong ba med pa dang / smra ba'i nang du zhum
125b1: med pa dang chos bshad pa'i nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la sbrel zhi bstan pa shes pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su
125b2: 'thun pa bstan pa shes pa dang / khengs pa dag la lag na rdo rje ston pa dang / mngon par chags pa rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang / yongs su smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/ dgu po 'di
125b3: dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dogs pa thams cad la the tsom med par ston pa shes pa dang / blos chos skye ba'i sgom dang / shes
125b4: rab kyi snang ba gzhan la ltos pa ma lus pa dang / yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par rab tu brjod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med
125b5: par brjod pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang / dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste/ rig
125b6: kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes
125b7: pa/ / blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste// tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog/ shin du rnam nges don dang de bzhin gzungs// de ni lus can kun gyi yid 'od dga'// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing //
125b8: de yi rnam par ltung ba kun chad pa// 'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i rgyan yin no// lha mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa skye// de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub// nan tan snying por byed dang yang dag ldan// 'di ni tshul khrims
126a1: dag pa'i rgyan yin no/ / de yi ting 'dzin rgyum ma yin te// shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong // de yi mya ngan 'das pa sgyu ma men// 'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims skyon med tshul
126a2: khrims rnam par dag/ tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma med// de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur// bzod pa dag cing de bzhin brtson
126a3: 'grus dag/ bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin gshegs rab dag/ thabs dang de bzhin pag yod dag pa yin// g.yo ba med cing brtan la shin du gnas// sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor rnam 'phro med// lhod pa spangs shing dgang sa
126a4: gso yang sra/ / 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste// de yi sems ni nam yang gdung mi 'gyur// de la yid la chags par 'gyur med de// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims
126a5: dag pa'i rgyan/ / 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi zhum ste// bsam pa nges shing zhi la yid rab zhi// 'dir ni de yi bcings pa lhod par gyur// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// grags chen sems ni las su rung ba yin//
126a6: de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid// 'dir ni rang lus mtshan gyis rgyan byed pa// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste// de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag
126a7: sems brgyan/ / 'di ni gang ngag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan// theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin byed// gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas// rang gi skye ba legs par
126a8: rgyan par byed/ / byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing // byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed// stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag rgyan byed cing // nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs par brgyan// de ni byams pas sems can kun
126b1: khyab byed/ / mkhas pa rtag tu drang dang mnyen pa yin// g.yo ni med cing rgyu med bcos pa med// gti mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ma yin// de ni sgrib pa lnga po rnam par sel// bag yod gyur nas rjes su dran drug bsgom// byang chub
126b2: yan lag bdun dang lam bsgom ste/ mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed// rnal 'byor pa ni zhi gnas des sems sbyor// de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chud mi gson// dben dang shin du sbyangs dang so sor rtog/ 'phags
126b3: pa'i rigs la dbang ni sbyar ba yin/ / chos rnams la ni the tsom med par gyur// de la kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med// de la ma rig gti mug mun pa med// bden pa snang ba yongs su shes pas shes// tshul khrims dag pa dmig
126b4: pa med pa ste/ / shes rab dam pa bsam gtan ting 'dzin dag/ gnyis bsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa dag/ dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags// 'dod chags bral ba'i shes pas
126b5: chos kyang dag/ dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med// 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te// rmi lam sgyu ma tshol ba med pa'i phyir// bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams// 'khor
126b6: gsum po dag de dag rnam par sbyong / / shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur te// gzugs brnyan sgyu ma brag cha 'dra ba'i phyir// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes
126b7: rab kyis ni bzod pa brgyan gyur te/ / mkhas pa mtho min dma' bar 'gyur min dang // dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan gyur te// skyo ba med cing
126b8: bsam pa brtan pa dang / / de ni blang ba med cing dor med pa// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur te// de la ma chags gyur dang lhag mthong dang // mkhas pa mngon par shes pa
127a1: skyed pa dang / / 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par spyod// shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang rgyan byed de// shin du sdud dang gzungs dang yang dag slon// 'khor gsum po dag de ni nam spyod zhing / sems can chos dang de bzhi
127a2: zhing rnams spyong / / dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran mi 'jug/ yang dag spong ba rnams la gnyis med de// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben// sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes// bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil
127a3: mi non/ / chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs// de bzhin lam la 'od med 'gro ba med// 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// de ni shin du zhi bas zhig nas shes// de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te// chos
127a4: kyi phung po ci zhig phung po shes/ / khams ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes// des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes// brten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de// don dam bden par 'khrugs pa med par shes// /
127a5: tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes// dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes 'jug/ rnam par gzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes// dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan nyid gcig tu shes// 'di ni gang dag shes
127a6: rab ldan pa'i rgyan/ / rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes// yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no// rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste// 'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do// 'du 'phrod
127a7: byung ba mig yor lta bu ste/ / rkyen rnams kyis kyang breg cha ji bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes// de bzhin nyid ni gnas med de rab shes// yang dag mtha' ni rtag du mig yo chos// 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med//
127a8: shes rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs pa// brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol bar byed// de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med// chos rnams kun du 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed// don dang tshig 'phrul ni rtag tu mkhas// nges tshig shes pa
127b1: rtag par rtogs khong chud/ / chags med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang // rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang brdzun med tshig/ thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang // mkhas pa de ni ye shes rton par byed// des don mdo sde rtogs par rab tu shes/
127b2: gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing // 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin// de yi tshig ni bden pa'i rjes su 'thun// gzung bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin// de yi chos
127b3: bstan de ni 'bras bu yod/ / phyad pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug/ de yi spobs pa mgyogs bskye ba ste// shugs can dang ni myur dang rtag mi chags// rgyun chad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig/ legs par brgyus pa'i
127b4: breng bas legs brgyan bzhin/ / lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes// gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha min dang // mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes// 'khor lhags shes nas sre gad
127b5: med pa ste/ / smra ba mthong nas zhum par gyur pa'ang med// 'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang rjod// 'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes// lhag pa'i ngargyal can mthong snrel zhi yi// gtam rjod rnal 'byor mthong
127b6: nas rjes su 'thun/ / nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston// yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste// theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam yang rjod// dogs pa kun gyi the tsom gcod pa ste// blo yis chos rnams mngon sum
127b7: 'gyur ba yin/ / de ye shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos// yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad mi shes// don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun chags te// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan
127b8: bar gyur pa yin/ / kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas te// rnam par byad pa'i phan yon thug pa med// de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes// sangs rgyas gnang ba'i so so rig pa thob// de ni gzungs kyi brgyan pa
128a1: zla ba ste/ de mi yin tan di nga gzhan ga kyang / bskal par rgyun dam par rab brjo gyu/ yon tanamatha ni rtags par yinas so// bam po gsum sa// com ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang /
128a2: byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu snang ba gang dag gis snang bar gyur na byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su
128a3: dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ / brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i snang ba dang / blo gros kyi snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / shes pa'i
128a4: snang ba dang / bden pa'i snang ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
128a5: kyi dran pa'i snang ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsab chud mi gzon pa dang / dge ba'i rtsab ma byas pa sogs
128a6: pa dang / thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / don rnam par nges pa rjes su thob pa dang / yul drug gis mi 'phrogs pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos spang zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa rgya chen po phran sum/
128a7: tshogs par gyur pa dang / de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang / dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin te/
128a8: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don gyi blo gros
128b1: yin gyi ga 'brub bla klas ma yin pa dang / ye shes bya bra gras yan gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i bla gros ma yin pa dang / rdzam byan zas yan ma/ nyan mangs pa' rnams ma yin pa dang / rigs pa'i tha bras can gyi/ gal ba'i bran du/
128b2: ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi blo gros yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / rlabs po che'i blo gros yin gyi/ dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi/ bdud rtsi
128b3: gros ma yin pa dang / snying rje chen po'i bla gros yin gyi/ sems can la rnam par 'tshe ba'i bla gros ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos kyi snang ba ni brtad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sem
128b4: dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rtogs par khod du chud par 'gyur ba dang / dgongs te bstan pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems
128b5: can gyi bsam pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par
128b6: 'gyur ba dang / snrel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par
128b7: 'gyur ba te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang she na/ 'dil ste/
128b8: sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams la shes rab kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / lam shin du bsgoms pa'i phyir
129a1: sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'dod pa dang / srid pa dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa mi slong ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i
129a2: phyir 'dras ma byas pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa la shin du rtogs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang / chos rnams
129a3: shin du nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad pa
129a4: 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang she na/ 'di lta ste/ brgyad pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i
129a5: snang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba
129a6: ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ / rigs kyi nga byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa da la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa
129a7: bsgom pa gang gis 'bras phudang po 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom dgang gis 'bras bu gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gsum pa 'tho yang
129a8: 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis rang sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang bden pa bsgob pa gang gis
129b1: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bdan pa bsgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
129b2: rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad ga she na/ 'di la ste/ lha'i mig gis gzugs thams cad yang dag par
129b3: mthong ba'i phyir gsal ba'i snang ba dang / lha'i rna bas sgra thams cad thos pa'i phyir nges par rtog pa'i snang ba dang / sngon gyi gnas bskal pa grangs med pa'i rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi
129b4: sems la lta ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba dang / zag pa med pa'i shes pa yongs su sogs par byed pa'i
129b5: phyir shes pa'i snang ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs kyi snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
129b6: dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba na dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang she na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrub pas ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas shes
129b7: rab kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas blo snang ba dang / sgrub pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas zhi gnas kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba dang / sgrub pas sems can gyi bsam pa snang ba dang / srab pas
129b8: pa med par sems rnam par grol ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas shin du mthar thug pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe chagasas
130a1: bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / dran pa de dang yang dag 'dres pa ni// sngon chad las dge bsags pa chud mi gzon// phra bar sngo pa phun sum tshogs pa de// phyir phyir zhing ni yang dag sgrub par byed// thos pa'i chos rnams
130a2: la ni brjed pa med/ / rnam par nges pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur// nye bar zhibs yul rnams las ni sras// dran dang ldan pa mi dge rnams dang bral// dran pa rgya po che ni shin du bsags// bya ba byab dag ni rnam par 'byed// dran pa dag
130a3: dang ldan par rig nas ni/ / rgyal ba rang byung dag gis byin gyis rlob// dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong byed pa// de ni 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus// shes rab ldan pa mun pa rnam bral te// lha dang mi rnams kyi nodon kyang byed// blo gros
130a4: bzang ldan snang ba thob 'gyur nas/ dogs pa dang ni the tsom rnams kyang gcod// dran dang ldan pa rang 'byung ye shes kyis// byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed// de ni don gyi blo gros can yin gyi// tshig 'bri'i rjes su mi rgyug
130a5: sgra la'ang med/ / sems can dag pa ye shes blo gros can// rnam par shes pa'i blo gros 'dod ma yin// chos kyi blo gros ldan par gyur pa de// nyon mongs blo gros sel cing gti mug bral// shes rab dang ni thabs kyi tshul shes pa//
130a6: de ni rgyal ba'i byang chub 'gal mi byed// de ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan// nyan thos 'gyur min rang rgyal 'gyur ma yin// rtag tu rlabs chen blo gros can yin gyi// de ni blo gros chung ngu 'dod ma yin// sangs rgyas blo gros
130a7: rtag tu ldan yin gyi/ / bdud kyi blo gros su ni 'gyur ma yin// blo gros ldan pa snying rje cher gzhol gyi// sems can gang la'ang rnam par 'tshe ba min// chos 'ga' bstan pa gang yin de la ni// the tsom med cing rtog pa khod du chud/
130a8: de ni dgongs te gsungs la mkhas 'gyur zhing // sems can spyod pa rnams la rtogs dang ldan// so so yang dag rig la rtogs ldan zhing // de yi shes pa 'jug pa chags pa med// rkyen byung byed pa po dang rnam bral bar//
130b1: rten pa'i chos rnams dag ni rab tu shes// de ni snrel zhi'i rgyu la mkhas gyur cing // spyi'u tshugs tshugs tshul ni rtogs par khong du chud// sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams ji snyed pa// thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khong du chud// 'jig
130b2: rten pa yi chos kyi snang ba yis/ / lha mi rnams kyi las kyi bya ba shes// 'jig rten las ni 'das pa'i ye shes kyis// shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin// kha na mthor bcas dang mtho med// ye shes rab tu gsal ba chen po
130b3: 'jug/ lam ni shin du bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'bras bu yod par chos ston to// zag par bcas dang zag pa med pa yi// chos la de yi snang bar rab tu 'jug/ de ni zag pa thams cad spong byed cing // lha dang mi
130b4: rnams kyi nadon kyang byed/ / 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas chos rnams la// de yi shes pa rtag tu rab tu 'jug/ de ni de yis dri bral rab rib med// skyon med thob nas sbyang ba rnams kyang spyod// rnam par byang dang kun nas nyon mongs
130b5: de yi shes pa sgrib pa med pa 'jug/ rang bzhin gyis ni sems 'od gsal ba dang // kun nas nyon mongs pa yi tshul yang shes// ji ltar mya ngan 'das par gyur pa ni skye ba med cing 'byung ba med par shes// 'di 'dra'in
130b6: ni theg pa chen po la/ / chos kyi snang ba mtha' yas gyur pa yin// de ni brgyad pa yi ni shes pa dang / rgyun du zhugs la shes pa 'jug pa dang // lan cig phyir 'ong ba yi shes pa dang // phyir mi 'di la shes pa 'jug pa dang // ded na
130b7: dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal dang / / 'jig rten mgon po byang chub sems dpa' dag/ kun la de ye shes dang sgrub pa rnams// lhag ma lus pa med par rab tu 'jug/ gang gis 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang // 'khrugs
130b8: med don dam nges par 'byung 'gyur ba/ / de la rab sgoms smra ba dpa' bo rnams// bden pa'i snang ba dag dang ldan pa yin// bden pa dag ni bsgom pa byas pas na// skyon med 'jug dang 'bras bu dang po 'thob// gnyis dang gsum
131a1: dad de bzhin pazhi pa dang / / rang rgyal rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// bsgom pa gang gis su ni smra ba'i stag/ de dag bzod pa dag ni thob 'gyur dang // gang gis rgyal ba byang chub 'tshang rgya ba// bden pa de dag la ni
131a2: snang bar 'gyur/ / lha yi mig gis su ni de yis kyang // gzugs kyi rnam pa dag ni thams cad mthong // lha yi rna ba nges par rtogs pa yis// phyogs bcu dag gi sgra rnams rtogs par 'gyur// sngon gyi gnas shes pa yi snang ba yis//
131a3: Al pa khrag zig dag ni rjes sung na// 'od gsal pa'i shes pa'i snang ba yis// gzhan gyi sems kyi stong pa gzhan lam khas// rdzu phrul rtson shes pa'i snang ba yis/ phyogs bcu ning ni thag zig rnams su 'akri// bag pa med
131a4: pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ni/ / nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin// bsod nams kyi ni snang ba mtha' yas pig/ mngon shes theg mi 'gro banye bar 'gro// de ye shes pa chags pa med pa yis// 'gro ba'i dogs padag ni gcod par
131a5: byed/ / nan tan snying por byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dran dang blo gros rtogs dang chos shes snang // bden pa yi ni snang ba mtha' yas te// mngon par shes pa'i snang bar gyur pa yin// sgrub pas ye shes dang ni shes rab dang // rgya chen thod
131a6: spobs pa mtha' yas dang / yang dag lta ba dang ni lhag mthong dang // shin du 'khrugs pa med pa mthar thug gyur// snang ba shin du rnam par dag pa brgyad// 'di dag mthu chen gang la yod pa ni// re shig byang chub thob par ma gyur kyang // de ni
131a7: sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa bcu drug gis sems can rnams la
131a8: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / bcu drug gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa/ lta ba sna tshogs dang 'dres pa dag ste/ lta ba thams
131b1: cad spong ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur nas mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/
131b2: sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa dag ste/ phyin ci log thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems
131b3: dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa dag ste/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par
131b4: bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sgrib pa lngas sgribs te/ 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa/ khong khro ba mang ga/ rmugs pa dang gnyid la chags pa/ dam pa ma yin
131b5: la 'gyod pa kun nas langs pa/ zab mo chos la nges pa ma thob pa dag ste/ sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems
131b6: can 'di ni skye mched drag gis chags pas chags te/ mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa yin/ rna bas sla thos/ snas dri rnams/ lces ro myangs/ lus kyis rig bya rnams la reg/
131b7: yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dag yin te/ khyi mched drug gis chags pa spangs pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems
131b8: dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga bo snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / chung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'ang
132a1: rgyal gyis bcom pas chung ngu dag pas bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/ mtshungs pa dag pas ni bdag cag che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa dang / ches che ba dag pas kyang bdag
132a2: cag ches che'o snyam du bdag la rlom sems su byed pa/ gzugs la bdag tu khas len pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag tu khas len pa/ ma thob par bdag la thob pa snyam du shes pa/ bdag cag ni 'phags pa'o snyam du
132a3: bdag la sems pa/ log pa'i lta ba la yang dag pa'i lta bar mos pa dag ste/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye ba
132a4: dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lam ngan par zhugs pa/ 'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba dag ste/ lam ngan pa spang zhing 'phags pa'i lam thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang
132a5: chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sred pa'i khol po// chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo la yongs su zhen pas sbags pa/ rang dbang med pa/ bdag la mi dpogs pa dag ste/ rang dbang yod cing bdag la
132a6: dpogs par bya ba dang / gar dga' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni phan tshun mi 'phrod pa/ khro ba dang /
132a7: zhe sdang dang / gnod sems mang ba dag ste/ khro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gnod sems spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di
132a8: dag ni sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa dag ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag 'chos
132b1: bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skyeb dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gam pa/ chags pas bral byas non pa// chog ma shes shing 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi gnas pa dang bral
132b2: bdag ste/ chags pa spangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni las kyi nas
132b3: par smin pa med par lta zhing rtag pa dang chad pa la gnas pa dag ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo dang / las dang bya ba la gzung ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o// snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems
132b4: dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni ma rig pa dang / gti mug gis ldongs pa/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag la mngon par zhen pa dag ste/ 'phags pa'i
132b5: shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par bya ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can
132b6: 'di dag ni 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba/ phung po lnga'i gshed mas yongs su zin pa dag ste/ khams gsum thams cad las dbyung ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'
132b7: snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa'i bcing bas bcings pa g.yob dang / rlom sems la gnas pa dag ste/ bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa thams cad la rnam par dgrol ba dang / g.yo dang rlom
132b8: sems spang ba'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba dang / kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo bcad cing ngan 'gro'i sgo phye ba dag ste/
133a1: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba dang / ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad pa'i phyir de dag la chos bstan par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa bcu drug po de dag gis semra
133a2: can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las ma 'dres pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/ de dag la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las
133a3: byed pa rnams yin no/ / sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dag gti mug gi gnyid kyis log pa dang / bdag shes rab kyis sang bar mthong nas shes rab kyis sems can rnams sad par byed pa 'di ni byang chub
133a4: sems dpa'i las ma 'dres pa dang po'o/ / sems can dag chung ngul mos pa dang / bdag rgya chen po la mos par mthong nas theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang / sems can dag chos ma yin
133a5: pa 'dod pa dang / bdag chos la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams chos 'dod pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dang / bdag 'tsho ba yongs su dag par mthong nas sems can rnams
133a6: 'chi ba yongs su dag par spyod pa dang / sems can dag lta bar gyur par byed pa dang / bdag yang dag pa'i lta bar zhugs par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can
133a7: d ag pa rag par gyur cing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa bsags par mthong zhing bdag rig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par rig nas sems can rnams rig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul
133a8: bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag log pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / bdag yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par mthong nas yang dag pa'i chos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa/
133b1: da / sems can dag ser sna can du gyur te kun du 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / bdag bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar mthong nas sems can rnams bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la
133b2: sbyor ba dang / sems can dag dang tshul ngan pa can du gyur te/ sdom pa la mi gnas pa dang / bdag tshul khrims yongs su dag par gnas nas/ sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can/
133b3: dag gnod sems mang zhing khro ba shas che ba dang / bdag bzod pa'i stobs dang / byams pa la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams bzod pa'i stobs dang / byams pa la gnas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /
133b4: sems can dag le lo can du gyur te/ brtson 'grus chung ba dang / bdag le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag sems g.yengs shing
133b5: dran pa nyams pa dang / bdag mnyam par bzhag ste/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed par mthong nas sems can rnams sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag shes rab
133b6: 'chal bar gyur te/ dman zhing gti mug dang ldan pa dang / bdag shes rab dang ldan zhing gti mug dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams shes rab chen po dang / gti mug dang bral ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems
133b7: can dag rigs pa ma yin par lhung zhing yang ba'i byed pa brtsams pa dang / bdag thabs mkhas pa dang / ldan zhing yang dag pa'i las brtsams par mthong nas sems can rnams thabs mkhas pa dang / yang dag pa'i las
133b8: rtsom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag nyon mongs pas bcom zhing kun du rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul bar gyur pa dang / bdag nyon mongs pa thams cad las log
134a1: par mthong nas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i bcings pas bcings shing dmigs pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / bdag 'jig
134a2: tshogs la lta ba yongs su mos pa dang / ldan zhing dmigs pas bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mthong nas sems can rnams 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa dang / dmigs pa dang bral ba la sbyor ba dang / sems
134a3: can dag ma dul zhing ma sbas te byang ba ma yin pa dang / bdag dul zhing sbas te byang bar mthong nas sems can rnams dul ba dang / sbas pa dang / byang ba la rab tu 'bod pa dang / sems can dag byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi shes
134a4: te/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dzejom pa dang / bdag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung bar gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa la rab tu 'god pa dang /
134a5: sems can dag chu bor lhung zhing sdig pa 'dod pa'i dbang du song ba dang / bdag chu bo thams cad las yang dag par 'das par mthong nas sems can rnams chu bo thams cad yang dag par 'da' ba la sbyor ba dang / sems can dag dka' bo
134a6: mi bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang / bdag dga' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin par mthong nas sems can rnams la dga' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag phongs pa mang
134a7: zhidi dam pa ma yin pa la yongs su zhen pa dang / bdag ma phongs pa mang zhing dge ba bdud rtsi la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams yongs su zhen pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par sbyor ba dang / sems can dag dpral
134a8: zhing 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba dang / bdag 'phags pa'i nor dang ma bral zhing nor bdun dang ldan par mthong nas sems can rnams 'phags pa'i nor thob par bya ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag rtag tun zhing 'ams
134b1: rnam pa bzhi po'i sprul gdug pas zin pa dang / bdag nad med cing bde la 'gyur ba med par mthong nas sems can rnams nad thams cad spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can dag mi shes pa'i mun pas kun du gas
134b2: shing ye shes kyi snang ba dang bral ba dang / bdag ye shes kyi snang ba thob par mthong nas sems can rnams ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag khams gsum la chags pas chags shing rmad lnga' 'gro bar
134b3: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug pa mthong zhing bdag khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas par shes nas sems can rnams khams gsum yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can
134b4: dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam du zhugs shing g.yas phyogs kyi lam dang bral ba dang / bdag g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par mthong nas sems can rnams g.yas phyogs kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag lus dang
134b5: srog la chags shing nyes pa ma mthong ba dang / bdag lus dang srog la mi lta zhing nyes pa mthong ba yin par mthong nas sems can rnams lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / nyes pa mthong ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag sangs rgyas
134b6: dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang bral ba dang / bdag dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par gnas par mthong nas sems can dag sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun dang bral ba dang / bdag dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs
134b7: rgyun mi gcod par gnas par mthang nas sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dzud pa dang / sems can rnams dam pa'i chos las nyams pa dang / bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par gan
134b8: par mthong nas sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag ston pa rin po che dang ring dra gnas shing / rjes sa dran pa drug dang bral ba dang / bdag rjes su dran pa drug ma btang ba mthong nas
135a1: sems can rnams rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / bdag las dang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mthong nas sems can rnams las
135a2: dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba la rab tu 'god pa dang / sems can dag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par
135a3: mthong nas sems can rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la rab tu 'god pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i las sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni byang chub
135a4: sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pu la yin te/ de dag la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs par byed pa'i las byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa'i las ni tshad med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
135a5: kyi bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo/ ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'as rnam par byang ba'i sgo yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba yang de snyed do// rigs kyi bu gal te gang dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi lam/
135a6: kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur kyang sems can de dag thams cad kyi las gang yin pa de sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las kyi brgya'i char
135a7: yang nye bar mi 'gro/ / stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag ni rang gi rgyud kyi
135a8: na mongs pa spang bar nye ba gnas pa yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba nye bar gnas pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi las gang yin pa dang /
135b1: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las gang yin pa bas 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i las nyid mchog ces brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi las ni phyin ci log dang ldan pa/ nyan thos dang / rang
135b2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las ni nyi tshe ba dang ldan pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ni phyin ci log med cing tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i yon tan rtsom pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'dis sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos
135b3: dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
135b4: gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ / rjes su yi rang nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang
135b5: ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
135b6: yang bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ni ji tsam/ rnam pa ni gang lags/ rtags ni gang
135b7: lags/ / mtshan ma ni gang lags/ gnas ni gang lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phrin las ni ji ltar mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las ci tsam/ rnam pa ni gang lags// rtags ni gang lags// mtshan ma
135b8: ni gang lags/ gnas ni gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las rnams mngon sum du gyur pas mngon sum du bdag cag la legs par yang dag par
136a1: bshad du gsol/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i phyir shin du legs par nyon la yid
136a2: la zung shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las la 'jug pa tsam cung zad cig khyod la bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
136a3: thugs rje chen po ni skye ba yang med/ 'jug pa yang med do zhes brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni rtag tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro// de ni bskal pa grangs med par yongs su sku
136a4: babyas pas yang dag par bskyed pa ste/ 'jug pa yang med/ log pa yang med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po ni ma btang ga sems can thams cad la gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'thugs
136a5: rje chen po de ni ci tsam du las yongs su thob par bya bar sla ba ma yin pa de tsam du tshang med de/ de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de tsam du mi zad cing / de tsam du ring du song ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas rnga
136a6: ltar byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ byang chub ci 'dra ba thugs rje chen po yang de 'dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas
136a7: med par byang chub thob po/ / de la rtsa ba ni gang / gnas ni gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa ni gnas so// de gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par
136a8: yongs su shes te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa dang gnas med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya'o// sems can 'di dag gis ni rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med pa'i chos 'di dag khong du
136b1: mchung bas de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'o// de la zhi ba ni gang / nye bar zhi ba ni gang zhe na/ nang ni zhi
136b2: ba'o/ / byi ni nye bar zhi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de ni de'i rang bzhin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de ni de'i rang bzhin no// mig stong par yongs su
136b3: shes nas gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// rna ba stong par yongs su shes nas sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// sna stong par yongs su shes nas dri rnams la mi chug ste/
136b4: de'i phyir nye bar ni ba zhes bya'o// lho stong par yongs su shes nas ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// lus stong par yongs su shes nas reg bya rnams la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// yad
136b5: stong par yongs su shes nas chos rnams la mi chug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o// sems can 'di dag gis ni zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba khong du ma chud pas de dag gi khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin
136b6: gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o// ci'i phyir rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya zhe na/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs
136b7: pa med pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin/ nam mkha' dang mnyam par gzhol ba// nam mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam pa ste/ rang bzhin de ni shin du 'od gsal ba nyid do// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni
136b8: rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i di khong du mchud pas blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs te/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de dag gis khong du chud par bya'o snyam du sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
137a1: thugs rje chen po 'jug go/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'o// de la blang ba med pa ni gang / dor ba med pa ni gang zhe na/ blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o// dor ba med
137a2: pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dor ba'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med par chu bor 'jug pa na ji ltar de bzhin nyid la pha rol med pa dang / pha rol med pa ma yin par yang dag par rjes su mthong
