244b5: sgo dang / me'i 'od dang / rgyal bas rgyan pa dang / tsha bzhi byed dang / gdung ba med dang / nad sel dang / mig spyod dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid spyod dang / yan lag rnam par snang ba dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon
244b6: po dang / 'od ser po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa dang / ming de lta bu dang / ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu phab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming bskal
244b7: par yang zad par sla ba ma yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can
244b8: sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba/ zas dang skom med pa/ gcer bu gos med pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dgas rnams bkres shing / skom pas yongs su zin pa gcer bu rang gi sgras yog pa/ mchil ma dang dar bsnabs dang / khrag dang / rnag
245a1: 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi char khyod kyis phob shig/ de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang /
245a2: myang ba dang / bldag pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang / btud pa thams cad kyi char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab po// gos kha dog du ma dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du
245a3: ma dang / pra zhing 'jam pa ka tsa li ni di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad kun tshim par byas so//
245a4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sems can na ba g.yog med pa nad du mas reg pa yod pa de dag gi don du sman chen
245a5: po'i cher gang gis na ba de dag thams cad nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba phob shig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des nad thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur
245a6: to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las 'od rab
245a7: du btang ste/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu ldan par gyur te/ ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu
245a8: zha bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / zug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa
245b1: da khyang sa dang / zan po da / bran po dang / dra ma dang / khye dang / ba mdang / sas dag / ta dang / bkra dang / shing dang / bang ba chu dang / gcon pa dag kyi ba dang / grong dang / zong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gang sa dang / yul 'kho dang/
245b2: pa'i nga 'khor dang / bskyed mos 'tshal dang / yang tog dang / 'ang brtags pa dang/ 'ang bams dang / babs dang / ska ba dang / zlabakham pa dang / phre dang / khyogs dang / grang ban pa dang / klung ban dag panas tand nas
245b3: giseng ba dang ldan pa'i shing d+ha'i bar gyi char bar snang las mngon par rab tu ba po/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnamamakha' mad kyis de lta bur byin gyis parlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po la smras pa/ rigs
245b4: dag 'di dag long la byin cig/ yongs su gtang bar gyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan ces bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la'
245b5: skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i char ni phab na/ de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i char pob shig/ des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
245b6: dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsngags pa ji snyed brjod pa de snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i sgra bar snang las byung ngo / / de bzhin tu bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi yon
245b7: tan gyi sgra yang ci tsam phyogs bcun sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang des pa'i tshig dang brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad mchad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar snang las
245b8: ma lus par rdzogs par byung ngo / / chos kyi sgrades stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byas so// de nas tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems/
246a1: dpa' kun du snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' shig na 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang yod snyam mo// de nas byang chub
246a2: sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba'i sems kyi kun du rtog pa sems kyis shes so/ / shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod shin du dri ma med
246a3: ci shin du rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su ci mthong ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang bas lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
246a4: rnams su bltas na/ des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu bab pa dang / chos kyi sgra thams cad grag pa dang / de bzhin du sangs
246a5: rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang mched ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung ba mthong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam gyi byin
246a6: rlabs thub pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ga lang yang cig car sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di 'dra ba'i char mngon par rab tu phab po zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu
246a7: dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning de dag mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa'
246a8: nam mkha' mdzod kyis rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bslang ba las 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas rgyal po'i khab nas bud med yugs mo lnga brgya thung nas byang chub sems
246b1: dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na bdag cag la'ang khyo stsol cig/
246b2: de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bud med de dag gi sngon gyi kye'i kha dag dang mtshan ma dang byibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes bu lnga brgyan ma mkha' las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
246b3: nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo gabadag bdag gi tshe ji lta ba bzhin du khrid cig/ de nas bud med de dag gis ji lta bur rang rang gi
246b4: khyo gang yin pa khrid nas dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dga' ste yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi khyim du dong ngo / / de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun du bud med de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/
246b5: phyir mi ldog pa de lta de ltar smin par byas so// de nas yang bud med lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa dag smras so// chos kyi rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma 'dra// chos kyi
246b6: mtshan nyid de ni sngon ma 'tshal/ / de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i khyo stsal te// bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la des smin bgyis// chos 'di thams cad yang dag sprul pa ste// g.yo ba med cing byed med snga nas stong// zag med ye shes bdag gi/
246b7: rab rtogs te// slan chad nyon mongs dbang du mi mchi'o// byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer bar bgyi// sems can rtswa chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos
246b8: mchog char pa dpa'/ / dren mchog thub pas de dag lung bstan pa// khyed cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur ba ni// s+yAd pa spyad nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag/ shin du dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur// yang de'i tshen mi lnga brgya gsad par chad
247a1: g sod du khrid pa las de dag gis par snang las sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin bzhig yod kyi del rkye
247a2: cag phyag 'tshal cig dang gsad pa'adi las thar bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes sgra zhig thos so// de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs skrag pas sgra skad gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po namamatha
247a3: mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad ces smras so/ / tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bar snang las mi lnga brgya babs te/ der lpags nas gshed ma'i mi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed cag gis
247a4: mi dbul po 'di dag gsad de ci rung / ded cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer la dad cag gi srog chod de mi 'di dag khye shig/ de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir gsad pa'i phyir de lnga brgya po de dag btang ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bud dag bas
247a5: do/ / de nas mi bsad pa las btang ba de dag gsod pas 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang
247a6: mgo bos phyag 'tshal/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la lang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di snyed ces gsol to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bdag cag gi srog dang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par bgyis na/ bdag cag
247a7: chos gang lanan tan du bgyis pas bdag la ldan pa dang / gzhan la snyan pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa bdag cag la sal du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzad kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu thed cag than
247a8: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro// de dag 'dend ces smras pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
247b1: sems bskyed do/ / de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bgya stong ri ba dzi ras bcos bu zung cig byin te/ grogs po dag ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig/ de dag thams cad kyis ram bcos
247b2: buzung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos tshul yang dag par bsgrubs nas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i
247b3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang mi skam mi zad mi rengs pa'i rnam
247b4: mkha' mdzod ga nag nas ji srid lon/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ji nam mkha' skam pa'am zad pa yod dam dengs par 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta ma yin no// smras pa/
247b5: btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub de ni nam mkha' ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der bsngos pas de bas na nam mkha' la mdzod mi skam mi zad mi dengs so// yang khyod kyis nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag
247b6: zhes ji srid lon zhes zer ba ni kho bos byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do/ / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pas mkhyen to// de nas
247b7: gnas pata ra shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ shA ri'i
247b8: khugal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di ni sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dang par gyur pa dag mchis kyis
248a1: bshad drags pa/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di sa ste dper na grang gA'i klung gi khyim snyed kyi 'jig rten gyikhams na gang gA'i brang gi byem ji skad kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul pa du ci rab rnyed pa
248a2: yongs su gyur te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya sto shing rdul phra mo cig bzhag la de lta bur bgrang ba dang / mtshan ma bzhag pa de snyed kyi rdul phra ma thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi dri srid nas byang chub sa
248a3: dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi zad
248a4: nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
248a5: bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
248a6: bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las shin du byung ba rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang shA ri'i
248a7: bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ni tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas kyang bshad par slab ma yin no/ / shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong
248a8: tshad du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig zung ste/
248b1: rin po che mdzod pasam gyis mi khyab bo// de'i bu rngus te skyes pa ngag zi brjid kyis mngon par thub pa dgu khri drug stong yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing den bud med kyi ming yang med do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
248b2: pade'i tshe tshed bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub bo/ / de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bsrung bas par gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur/ bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang rim grong byas te nyin gcig la 'god pa yang ri rab bye ba stong
248b3: snyed kyi rin po che phung po zad par 'gyur ba stu bus bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byas so/ / de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang / grong gi mi rnams dang / 'khod rnams dang bcas te blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
248b4: byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
248b5: dpa' nam mkha' mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma byang chub
248b6: sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen po rnyed par nus so//
248b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang sti stang byas te byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangs so//
248b8: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag pas bsam pa yongs su dag pa'o// gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs// gad gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs su dag pas
249a1: lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
249a2: yongs su dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag las bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
249a3: snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa
249a4: yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pas
249a5: thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su sbyangs/
249a6: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag pas byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa nas/ snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang /
249a7: btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pa dang ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa ste/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas/
249a8: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs su dag pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du des gang gA'i
249b1: klang gi byi ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag pas nam mkha'i mdzod 'di yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
249b2: mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon lam dong spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas gang la yang
249b3: zad pa med do/ / des na 'di nam mkha' mdzod ces bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang / lag na rin po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bsang ba'i bzod pa skyes so//
249b4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrags pa'i mdzod mnyan to// nam mkha'
249b5: mdzod kyis smras pa/ / de'i phyir rigs kyi bu gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par 'dug la/ nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes bskyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po
249b6: dang 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // nam mkha' 'ja
249b7: pa'i yid rnams kyi/ / thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin// de la 'jug pa'i rab bstan gyis// khyed cag mthar gyis mnyan par gyis// nam mkha' la ni mtho ba med// dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te// gang gi chos nyid mthon dman med//
249b8: del 'dud pa ga la yod// nam mkha' la ni skye ba med// 'gog pa dag kyang mi dmigs so// ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la// de la rnam par rtog pa med// nam mkha' la ni bri ba med// gang ba dag kyang mi dmigs so// chos rnams gang
250a1: med bri med de/ / nam mkha' dang ni marungs mnyam mo// nam mkha' la ni mun pa med// da ni de yis nyon mi mongs// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// de bas rnams kyang nyon mongs mad// tig yin 'a /
250a2: zer gyis// nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang // gang la'ang dga' bar 'gyur ba med// mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang // nam mkha' la ni nyon mongs med// de bzhin sdug bsngal
250a3: sgo kun gyis/ / rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mi mongs// bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis// nam mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med// rnyed dang sti stang thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed// bstod pa dang ni smad pa la// nam mkha'
250a4: yongs su mi rtog ste/ / de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la// byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi g.yo// sa dag g.yos par gyur kyang ni// nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba min// 'jig rten 'di dag g.yo 'khrug kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug
250a5: pamed/ / bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na// ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'tshig pa// de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi gdung // skye ba med cing 'dul ba'ang med// ji ltar na mkha' gnas pa bzhin// chos
250a6: rnams 'gro meng 'od pa'ang med/ / chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas// gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa// nam mkha' las ni thams cad 'byung // chos su snang ba ji snyed pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings las byung // mtshan ma med cing gzugs med pa//
250a7: nam mkha' ltar yod ma yin te// de ltar sems rnams rab shes na// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs mnyam mo// ming tsam pa ni nam mkha' ste// de la kha dog dbyibs kyang med// sems dang yid dang rnam shes kyang // ming gis yongs su bstan
250a8: pa'o/ / ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med cing // thams cad du yang gzung du med// de bzhin ye shes mthu chen yang // nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs sems can nam mkha' 'gro mod kyi de la 'gro ba'i rten kyang med// sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang /
250b1: de ni spyong pa'i mtshan ma min// ji ltar sngon gyi mtha' yi lus// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'ang ba// de bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshung sa// khams bzhi dag kyang nam mkha' dang // mtshungs shing 'dra bar rab tu gsung /
250b2: 'di ltar sreg pa'i bskal pa la'ang // nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di mtshungs// ji ltar sems can thams cad kyis// nams kyang yongs su gang mi nus// de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis kyang // sems kyi rgyud ni mi gang ngo // tshig chen seng ge'i sgrar gnas/
250b3: 'jig rten mgon zhes gsungs pa ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab gang // de dag bstan pa 'di la ngoms// ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che bas// tha ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang // mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur
250b4: ro/ / chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas so// gang gis yang dag nyid shes na// de dag dngos po mi 'jig cing // dngos po dag la'ang mi gnas so// dngos dang dngos med rnam shes shing // yang dag mtha' la gang gnas pa// dngos po dang ni dngos
250b5: med pa/ / lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to// stong pa nyid ni sgra yis bsgrags// sgra la stong pa nyid med de// de ni sgra med brjod pa med// de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad kyang ni// stong pa nyid ni brjod du med// gang de steng zhes bya ba
250b6: yang / / de yi don ni brjod du med// sku ma rmig rgyu rmi la ma dang // mig yor dang ni brag cha rnams// de la sogs pa bshad pa yis// 'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to// sems can rnams ni drad pa'i phyir// dpe rnams shin du kun bstan te// rab tu zhi ba'i
250b7: chos rnams la/ / gnyen po rnams ni ma dmigs so// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang // mtshan nyid du ni rab tu bstan// mtshan gzhi mtshan gzhi med pa dag/ chos kyi dbyings la mi dmigs so// mtshan bzhi nam mkha' mtshan nyid de// nam mkha'
250b8: mtshan nyid med pa yin/ / gang gis tshul 'dirab rtogs pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin// chags pa med cing bcings pa med// shin du cung zad med pa ste// spros med spros dang bral ba de// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems can
251a1: las ni ma grol ba/ / sems can la yang mi gnas shing // sems can rang bzhin ye shes kyis// byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya// sems can rab tu mya ngan 'das// thos nas sdang bar mi byed de// gang de byang chub rab zhugs pa//
251a2: dpa' bo dag gi go cha 'di// sgyum byed pa'i sems can dag/ mang du sprul nas der bsad dkyang // de la bsad pa gang yang med// sems can mtshan nyid de bzhin no// sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang // mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun// rnam pa kun du rang bzhin
251a3: gcig/ rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs// nam mkha' las ni nam mkha' mdzod// mi zad pa yi mdzod grub ste// sems can thams cad mgu byed cing // mdzod dezad pad mi 'gyur ro// tshad med bsod nams chu bos ni// mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs/
251a4: pa ste// chos rnams la yang 'pho med par// chos rnams chos nyid blta bar bya// rgyal rten te 'byung ba yi// chos rnams thams cad rab shes na// de yi mdzod ni mi zad de// chos kyi mdzod ni bsam mi khyab// chos bzhi 'di dag mi zad par// 'jig rten
251a5: mgon pos rab gsungs te/ / sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so// de ste de dag rdzas yin na// de dag yongs su zad 'gyur gyi// de dag med pas mi zad ces// de bas de ni mi zad gsungs// chos ni rab tu skad
251a6: cig pa/ / zad pa chos ni mi zad de// mi zad de la zad pa med/ de phyir mi zad pa zhes bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis// chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na// des ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'// byang chub phyir la yang dag zhugs// tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa
251a7: 'di byung ba na byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ / lha'i bu nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltar
251a8: mo can zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ro mtshar du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
251b1: nam mkha' mdzod la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la lan ljon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sgra 'dig las byung snyam du bdag ltad mor 'dzin par gyur
251b2: to/ / nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag cha'i sgra ga las byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed las brag tshang sgra 'byung ngo ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu brag cha la lus sam/ sems sam/ gzugs
251b3: sam/ / kha dog gam/ dbyibs gang yang yod dam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni med do// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji ltar breg tsha yongs su ma grub kyang sgra sgra dgo bar byed pa de bzhin du/ nam mkha' yongs su mgrub ste/ sgras dgo bar byed par
251b4: 'gyur ro/ / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sgra 'di go bar byed pa su gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byur// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ye shes kyi so sor rnam par rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kho bos yid kyi sems pas gang bsams pa de bar snang 'di las 'bur
251b5: yang sems der 'gro ba yang med/ de 'dir 'ong ba yang med mod kyi/ sgra'i sgra brnyan kyang 'byung ngo ro// rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa la ltos// gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang rgyu 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'phel/ d+hU medapa
251b6: las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin no/ / 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen las 'bras bu mngon par grub pa'i chos 'di gnyi ga la yang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do// gang de lta bu'i 'du shes pa de dag ni bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
251b7: ga kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba zhes gsungs so/ / kun nas nyon mongs pa bsal bas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ ga kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni rnam par byang ba'o// 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs
251b8: pa dang rnam par byad ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyi ga yang brda'i tshig go/ don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas nyon mongs dang rnam par byang ba yang dmigs su med do// don dam pa'i mtha' ni mtha' yin te/ gang 'di mtha' ma yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o//
252a1: gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid kyi mtha'o// gang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' de bdag gi mtha'o// gang bdag gi mtha' de ni chos thams cad kyi mtha'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni de'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mtha'/ nye bar
252a2: zhi ba'i mtha' ste/ gang mtha' de gsum gyi sgo la mi chags pa de ni chos thams cad la mi chags pa'i ye shes rnyed do// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i thus byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ltad mo can zhes ming
252a3: sus btags/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang dang gang du chos la 'dun pa dang brtson pa de dang der ltad mor mi 'gyur ram// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kho bo chos thams cad la 'dun cing con
252a4: pa de dang der kho bos nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur snyam du ltad mo dang ldan te/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la kho bo ltad mor gyur to// sems can thams
252a5: cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo ltad mor gyur te/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// gang la kho bo ltad mor mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang yang med/ 'jug pa de gang yang med pas de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// gang du
252a6: kho bo ltad mor gyur pa der nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bdud kyi lha thams cad kyi skabs med de de'i phyir na kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu
252a7: dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston kyang gang la'ang mi chags te/ chags pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang ston pa ni ngo mtshar to// de nas 'khor de nyid du
252a8: byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa las brtsams te/ gang ci 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin
252b1: yongs su snang ba bya ba la spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
252b2: byang chub kyi snying por thogs pa med par 'gro ba bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yod do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/ de bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir/
252b3: gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar
252b4: 'gyur ro/ / dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnyog pa med par 'gyur ro// mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar
252b5: 'gyur ro/ / 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yas phyogs kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgyu dang lta ba las rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro// dga' byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi kun dga'
252b6: la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro/ / skar ma'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin ni sbyin gnas yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mthu drag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems mi 'dzum par 'gyur ro// mtshungs par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa zhes
252b7: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyur ro/ / byed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las rnam par smin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// seng ge'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jigs pa dang spu zing zhes
252b8: byed pa med par 'gyur ro/ / sems pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro// pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro// pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
253a1: ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi rgyun du 'gyur ro/ / 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing snang bar 'gyur ro// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro//
253a2: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang bar 'gyur ro// skar mda' ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bag chags thams cad 'jom par 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
253a3: ni man pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su
253a4: 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / sred med kyi bu lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'jom par 'gyur ro// snying po'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje'i lus mi byed par 'gyur ro// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
253a5: 'dzin ni dam bcas pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa las mi nyams par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar
253a6: 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// sa 'dzin
253a7: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chags pa dang zhe sdang med par 'gyur ro/ / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud bzhi las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// lus rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
253a8: gzugs thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur ro// rnam pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya
253b1: pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / 'khor lo de ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi skad cig
253b2: 'jig pa la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro/ / legs par byas pas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad
253b3: spong bar 'gyur ro/ / lus kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngag gi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pas sems can thams cad kyi sems mgu bar
253b4: 'gyur ro/ / sems kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams par 'gyur ro// brten pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mtshungs par gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can tha dad pa med
253b5: par 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims bsags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i go bgos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes
253b6: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur ro/ / tshad med pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// ci yang med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su sbyor bar 'gyu'o//
253b7: lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi skar mda' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
253b8: sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las dang bya ba sna tshogs la 'jug par 'gyur ro// mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lta ba thams
254a1: cad yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro/ / stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa dang lha ba thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa
254a2: thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mig mo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yo ba dang sems pa thams cad 'jom par 'gyur ro// sgra dang ldan pa
254a3: zhes byaba'i ting 'dzin ni rlobs pathogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ kun 'dini pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni thob pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ na pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshad med pa'i snod kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
254a4: cad tshol bar 'gyur ro/ / mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad mthu bar 'gyur ro// rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lag na rin po che rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
254a5: sems can thams cad kyisems shes par 'gyur ro/ 'grob la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'grob thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro// blo thos la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nasams dang / yid rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sbyin
254a6: nga ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud rtsi'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro// chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
254a7: ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ / ge 'dun rjes su ngan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gtod ba rjes mya ngadran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phung po thams cad
254a8: rab tu 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la rab tu 'god par 'gyur ro// lha rjes su ngadran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam par dag pa'i chos la kha na ma tho ba med par /
254b1: 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyibs la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyur ro/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa
254b2: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / rgyud chags pa dang rgyud ma yin pa'i rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba lati nge dzin ni yi ge thams cad dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shin du sbyangs pa
254b3: dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin/ gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de sems skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
254b4: rigs kyi bu de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad bcu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de re re la yang 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// de dag thams cad bsdoms na ting nge 'dzin bzhi khrir 'gyur te/ de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang
254b5: bas ting nge 'dzin brgyad khrir 'gyur ro/ / de dag mngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi zad pa ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa chos kyi sgo mo yang de snyed/ chos kyi phung po yang de snyed de/ de'i
254b6: phyir sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pas bshad ces bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sems can rnams shes par
254b7: bya ba'i phyir chos kyi mdo'o/ / gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dag dang / sems can gyi spyod pa mtha' dag la 'jug pa de ni tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bskal pa brgyad stong gi mthar 'dug kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
254b8: 'di yongs su bstan cing ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dag bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong ni ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa
255a1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di bstan pa ni
255a2: legs par smras te/ lus mngon sum pas gzhan gyi dred la mi 'jog pa'i chos rnams la ji lta bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su brjod pa 'di shin du yongs su bstan pa ni legs so legs so// /
255a3: 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa// bam po lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi thad du byang
255a4: chu ba sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis thog mar nam mkha' 'di las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu bag/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
255a5: sngon byung ba 'dam pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i pha rol gyi yang chos pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
255a6: 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba ska rags shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yon tan gyi
255a7: 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu ska rags shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang 'byor pa/ bde ga lo legs pa/ rgyas pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis rgyan pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa
255a8: gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi pad ma bkram pa/ rin po che gsal ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa/ mig mangs ris su bres pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di lta ste dper na gzhan
255b1: 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa ltar 'dug go// mi de dag thams cad kyang gzhal med khang dang / khad pa brtsegs pa na gnas par gyur cing bsam pas zas dang sgom rab tu 'byor to// de yang rigs kyi rung ba'i
255b2: gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po byung ngo / / yang rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams
255b3: kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rin pa che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyi brgyan pa da'i khang pa 'jam bu'i gling gi dbus su brtsigs par gyur to// shar phyogs su yang dbag tshad bzhi/ nub phyogs dang /
255b4: lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang dpag tshad bzhi bzhi pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ skyed mos tshal lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i btsun mo brgyad
255b5: khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go/ khye'u brgyad khri bzhi stor yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che chen po'i stobs dang drag shul 'char ba sha stag go// yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la btsu nom
255b6: rin po che gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi gzi brjid/ gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi 'od do// rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ btsun mo'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe lha mo de gnyis kyi
255b7: spad ba nas khye'u gnyis byung ste/ brdzus te skyes pa sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ smon lam rdzogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs pa ste/ gcig gi ming ni seng ge zhes bya/ gcig gi ming ni
255b8: seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ de gnyis byung ma thag tu sgra skad dang dbyangs gcig tu pa bsod nams kyi brgyan pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngon byas dge dang mi dge chud mi za// de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas
256a1: chud mi u0f7f/ / bsam pa byang chub sems kyang chud mi za// bsgrub pa gcod byed thos pa chud mi za// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa chud mi za// bzod dang nges pa rnams kyang chud mi za// byas pa gzo zhing dge ba'i las byas phyir// brtson/
256a2: 'grus brtsams pa byang chub chud miza// rtse gcig bsam gtan dang ni rnam thar sems// nges par rtogs dang shes rab sems mi nyams// ye shes las byas rtag tu mi 'khrugs te// me 'khrugs chos las byang chub rnyed mi dka'// de ni/
256a3: nyon mongs pa yis mi gos te// de ni slar yang mngal du mi gnas shing // de ni pad ma'i snying por brdzus te skye// mi gos pa ni pad ma chu las ltar// shar phyogs logs kyi rgyal ba sman pa'i rgyal// dus gsum mi chags ye shes dam pa
256a4: yi/ bde gshegs dri med 'od kyi gnas nas su// chos 'dod phyir ni de nas bdag cag 'ongs// u dum ba ra'i me tog ji lta bar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byung ba rnyed par dkas// de la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang blta slad du// bde
256a5: gshegs thad du yab kyang bzhud par bgyi/ / rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa 'di thos nas// bu dang btsun mo 'khor dang lhan cig tu// srog chags bye ba sdong gis yongs bskor te// rgyal ba de'i gan du nye bar dong // me tog dri zhim byug par
256a6: bcas pa yis/ / de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i mchod byas nas// zhabs la phyag 'tshal rab tu bskor byas te// thal mo sbyar ba btud nas spyan sngar 'dug/ seng ge dang ni seng ge'i rtsal 'gro yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la bzung nas su//
256a7: gtugs nas chos dang don ldan mkhas pa yi// 'phags pa des ni tshigs bcad 'di dag smras// khyod ni skyabs dang sgron dang dpung gnyen te// 'jig rten long ba rnams kyi sgron mar gyur// sems can rnams kyi bsam spyod gyur la mkhas//
256a8: ji ltar mos pa de bzhin gnas par mdzad// rgyal po 'di ni phyug cing skyid pas mos// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang bcas pas bcings// nam yang ston pa la ni mchod phyir yang // nye bar mi mchi chos ltag la nyan// mgon po thugs rje
256b1: myed pa nga/ / deste can na ma thas nas / theg pa mtsha las sngag pa ma 'thar ba/ byang rgya lamam can na lags par s+hon/ bcom ldan cagan pa tal brgyad pa myed/ rnamapa' dgas bzlanas pa na
256b2: sa/ sa/ ma ma la tshul na / na // sa la pa gas pa / da ma hA/
256b3: la dga' bskyed/ sems can gang par 'dod pas ngoms med de// phyir yang de bzhin 'dod pa ske ma zhing rgyu/ byis pa ma mi shes shing yul la gnas// shes rab gang ngoms de dag shin du mas// sbrum bu zhing snying po meng pa stang/
256b4: de bzhin phung po lnga yang sgyum 'dra// khams rnams 'di dag sbrul gdug bzhin du bstan// dbang po drug ni snang pa'i grong dang 'dra// bu dang drung ma rgyal srid yul 'khor yang // 'chi bar gnas pa'i grogs suM gyur pa med// sbyin dus kun sdom
256b5: tshul khrims phung po ni/ / de dag pha rol 'gro ba'i grogs yin no// nga yi gzugs dang yon tan spobs pa rdzogs// rdzu 'phral dag kyang ji 'dra rab ltos la// gal te 'di 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dod na// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems skyed cig//
256b6: rgyal po glang po das ni chos thos nas/ srog chags bye ba stong phrag bdun bcu dang / sras dang btsun mo stobs bcas grong mi rnams// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems skyed de/ bdag cag mchog ga sems ni bskyed par bci// sems can
256b7: thams cad 'gron duganyer bar bgyi/ / byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ang spyad par ban+d+ha// 'gro ba bla ma sangs rgyas 'byung bar bgyi// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal pa bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des bcom ldan 'das 'khod dang banas pa la
256b8: lo brgyad bri bzhi stong gi bar du rung ba med du 'ong ba kha na ma thob med pa'i bde ba'i yo byad dang yangs su longs spyod pa thams cad kyis rim grabyas so/ / bye'u se dag dang / seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba de gnyis bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan
257a1: pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / / de dag rab tu byung bas rgyal bu phyi ma nyi khri yang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas seng ge dang / seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i dge slong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / yo
257a2: byad bsnyungs pa dang / dben par spyod pa la sbyor zhing brtson pas ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// de dag mngon par shes pa rnyed pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs
257a3: kyis chos bshad nas de gnyis kyis sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su smin par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod par gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas rgyal po
257a4: bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po gal ba der song ba dang des khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngas ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi
257a5: bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas/ ngas ma byas pa ci zhig byas snyam du brnyas pa'i sems skyes so// rigs kyi bu de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i
257a6: 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de lta bur sems pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge rtsal gyis 'gro ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa
257a7: dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs ston la 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyis shig/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog bor gyis shig/ byang chub kyi lam 'bar bar gyis shig/ sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig
257a8: pas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar chod cig/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar gyis shig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rol pa'ang ston cig/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis
257b1: 'gro bas de'i dus na nam mkha' la lag pas thugs nas des nam mkha' la lag pas zugs pa dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab drugayos so/ / des yang nam mkha' la lag pas thugs pa dang /
257b2: de nas de'i tshe bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ma dgrol bar spa byung ngo // des yang nam mkha' la lag pas blugs pa dang / de nas par snang las sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i dri zhim ning 'jam paka tsa la na dika ltar reg na bde ba'i ma
257b3: tog rnams kyi char bab bo/ / des yang nam mkha' la lag pas blugs pa dang / de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu mngon par bab bo// longs spyod dang kun spyod pa thams cad kyi char rab tu bab po// ji lta bur stong
257b4: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der yo byad thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa de de lta bu'i zas dang skom dang bro'i char mngon par rab tu bab bo/ / nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal
257b5: pos rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sbyin pa yongs su btang ba dang rin po che'i char bab pa 'di dag mang // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i char 'di ni dper bgyi ba
257b6: yang sla ba ma lags te de tsam du tshad ma mchis so/ / bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba 'di mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'dod na/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
257b7: khams su 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char mngon par 'bebs so/ / gang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can de dag la ji lta bur 'dod pa bzhin du ngoms shing tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na gang sa bla'i lha rnams
257b8: kyis ma la 'di sems skyed ma thag tu nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa las na byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra phyung ngo / / ji ltar sa bla'i lha rnams kyis sgra blung bde
258a1: bzhin du bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang mal 'di sems bskyed ma
258a2: thag tu 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char rab tu bab pa las na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nam mkha' mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra phyung bas ming de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer
258a3: gyi rgyal po de rjes su yi rang ngo / / gang la ngas rjes su yi rang ba de la gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des byang chub sems
258a4: dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs de mthong nas khye'u rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug ste/ dad pas byim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas sbyin pa 'di ni sems
258a5: kun du chags pa'o/ / rab tu byung ba ni sems yongs su dag pa'o// sbyin pa 'di ni lus dang ngag gi bgegs so// rab tu byung ba ni lus dang ngag yongs su sbyong ba'o// sbyin pa 'di bgegs chen po'o// rab tu byung ba ni bgegs thams cad nye bar
258a6: zhi'o/ / sbyin pa 'di ni rtswa dang lo ma'o// rab tu byung ba ni snying po dang 'bras bur 'grub pa'o// sbyin pa 'di ni nga'i ba dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni 'jig
258a7: tshogs la lta ba las mi bskyod pa'o/ / rab tu 'byung ba ni lta ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni byis pa'i rtsed mo sbyar ba'o// rab tu byung ba 'di ni dul ba dang cang shes pa'i sa'o snyam du de de ltar tshul bzhin rab tu skyong zhing /
258a8: sems de lta bu dang bsam pa de lta bus de ltar rab tu byung ste gcig bu mi 'dra ba bag yod pa/ brtson pa rab tu dben par gnas pas ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams
258b1: kyi brgyan par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sbyang ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyi brgyan ces bya bar gyur to/
258b2: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ des thog mar nam mkha'i mdzod las rin po che'i char phab bo// de tshun chad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
258b3: brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med par nam yang nam mkha'i mdzod las rin po che'i char 'bebs pa mngon par shes pa las mnyams so/ / rigs kyi bu da ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge zhes bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems
258b4: dpa' byams pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu rgyal ba'i blo gros shes bya bar gyur to/ / gang rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pas rgyal por gtsug pa'o// rigs kyi bu de'i gsung rab kyang 'di ltar dga' zhing yongs su dag par gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa
258b5: ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnas su gyur to/ / sems can gang ji snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di
258b6: bstan pa na srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
258b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gang lags/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub
258b8: sems dpa' rnams kyi lam zhes bya ba ni pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
259a1: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rnams te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o// de la byang
259a2: chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no/ / gzugs sdug bsngal bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs bdag med par rig/ gzugs zhi bar rig/ gzugs stong par rig/ gzugs mtshan med par rig/
259a3: gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ gzugs ma skyes par rig/ gzugs mi byung bar rig/ gzugs rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rig/ gzugs dben par rig/ gzugs gzung ba med par rig/
259a4: gzugs kun gzhi med par rig/ gzugs 'byung ba med par rig/ gzugs smra pa lta bur rig/ gzugs rmi lam lta bur rig/ gzugs smika r+b+ha lta bur rig/ gzugs chu zla lta bur rig/ gzugs brag cha lta bur rig gzugs mig yong/
259a5: bung rig/ gzugs gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ gzugs rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang lam dang / mig yod lta bur rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug go// sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis
259a6: bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi
259a7: bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ / gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa ste/
259a8: sbyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba
259b1: dang bdag med par rig/ rnam par shes pazhi par rig/ rnam par shes pa stong par rig/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pang gi// rnam par shes pa smon pa med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du mi byed par rig// rnam par
259b2: shes pa ma skyes par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa dben par rig/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba med par rig/ rnam par shes
259b3: pa kun gzhi med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mi 'byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa rmi lam lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa smig rgyu lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa chu zla lta bur rig/ rnam par shes
259b4: pa mig yor lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes
259b5: so/ / sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin
259b6: nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes
259b7: su shes pas sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas tshul khrims srung ba nas/ gzugs
259b8: rna dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bar du rig nas tshul khrims srung ngo // de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin
260a1: nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang // sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid
260a2: kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ / gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas tshul khrims
260a3: desrung ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas tshul khrims srung ba nas rnam par shes
260a4: pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas tshul khrims srung ste/ de rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i
260a5: de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes
260a6: su shes so/ / gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig
260a7: chen las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas bzod pa sgom pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rjes su shes pa 'di lta bus brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan lamaH
260a8: par 'jog go/ / shes rab rnam par dpyod do// des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas/ gzugs rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang lam dang mig yong lta bur rig nas shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de gzugs kyi
260b1: de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyis de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ / shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi
260b2: de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ mnor
260b3: pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas shes rab rnam par dpyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
260b4: byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas shes rab rnam par dpyod do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
260b5: nyid kyis shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ / shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi de bzhin
260b6: nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor bde
260b7: bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas shes rab rnam par dpyod pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub
260b8: s ems dpas gzugs mi rtag par rig nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa nas gzugs rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang la ma dang mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa
261a1: nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo/ / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa nas chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du rjes su shes so// gang chos
261a2: thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas
261a3: rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas rgya cher de bzhin du sbyin pa
261a4: sbyin pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams kyang rgyas par bya ste/ gzugs mi rtag par rig nas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa nas/ rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang pha ma dang mig yod
261a5: lta bu'i bar du rig nas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
261a6: sgom pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// de ltar phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid do// dran
261a7: pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi de bzhin nyid do// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid
261a8: gang yin pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid do/ / bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do//
261b1: de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom yang chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog ste/ gang de ltar rjes su shes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das
261b2: pa'i lam zhes bya'o/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang
261b3: bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga yang de bzhin du rgyas par byas te/ des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas mngon par shes pa'i
261b4: ye shes sgrub par byed de/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / gzugs bdag med pa dang / gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med pa dang / gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ ma
261b5: skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / dben pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs
261b6: brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang lam dang mig yer lta bur rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub bo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig
261b7: nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal bar rig/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhi pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
261b8: 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / dben pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / mig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig
262a1: yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du riganas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ phung po 'di bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes
262a2: pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ / mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi de bzhin nyid do//
262a3: sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid do// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
262a4: ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ / de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rab tu sgrub ste/ gang de ltar rjes su shes pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten
262a5: las 'das pa'i lam de ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa ste/ gzugs 'jig pa ma yin/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel bar byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
262a6: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa ste/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa ma yin/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// gang phung po'i 'jig rten las rgyal ba de ni
262a7: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i 'jig rten pa la yang mi chags pa ste/ de mi chags pas 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston te/ gang 'jig rten 'jig par mi byed pa de ltar ston
262a8: to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid de 'jig par mi byed do// 'jig rten ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid/ mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid/ smon pa med
262b1: pa'i mtshan nyid/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid nas de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi bar du ste/ 'jig rten 'jig par mi byed pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag pa'o// gang lam/
262b2: yongs su dag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' log pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba chen po byed do// de dag snang ba rnyed nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de nyid la rab tu gnas so// byang chub kyi snying
262b3: po 'thob par byed pa'i phyir lam 'di ni rab kyi mchog go/ / mi dge ba thams cad kyis sems med pa'i phyir lam 'di ni mchog go// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo rnyed pa'i phyir lam 'di ni dam pa'o// chu bo thams cad las sgrol ba'i phyir lam/
262b4: 'di ni rkun med pa'o// nyi tshe ba'i lam thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir lam 'di ni gong na med pa'o// gnyen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir lam 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'o// sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi lam du yang dag par 'gro ba'i phyir lam 'di ni mi
262b5: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa'i phyir lam 'di ni bde bar 'gro bgo mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa'i phyir lam 'di ni mi thogs par 'gro ba'o// shes rab
262b6: kyis snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam 'di ni mun pa mun nag med pa'o/ / sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i phyir lam 'di ni drang po'o// sems kyi glu med pa'i phyir lam 'di ni gsal ba'o// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i phyir
262b7: lam 'di ni mnyam pa'o/ / sems can thams cad la go 'byed pa'i phyir lam 'din rgya che ba'o// phan tshun gnod par mi 'gyur bas lam 'di ni yangs pa'o// yongs su mi skyo bar 'gro bas lam 'di ni rnal du 'dug pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du
262b8: phyin pas lam 'di ni bsod nams kyis brtan pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pas lam 'di ni gdung ba med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pas lam 'di ni 'jigs pa med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pas lam 'di ni mi
263a1: zlogs pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pas lam 'di ni rdul thams cad dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas lam 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'gro ba'o// nga rgyal med pas lam 'di ni ye
263a2: shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o/ / dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas lam 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'grol ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'o// sngon thos pa mi slu ba'i phyir lam 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
263a3: skor ba rjes su 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag pa ste/ lam yongs su dag pas gang la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po dgos te/ theg pa
263a4: chen po de la zhugs nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der 'gro ba'o/ / de la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go cha ste/ gru chen po yang dag par sbyor bas ma rgal bsgrol ba'i go cha'o// nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i bcings pa thams
263a5: cad las yongs su 'grol bas ma grol ba 'grol ba'i go cha'o/ / yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'dor bas dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa'i go cha'o// med pa la phyin ci log tu gyur pa mnyam pa nyid du ston pas
263a6: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa mya ngan las bzla ba'i go cha'o/ / bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gang zag mi dmigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su grol ba'i go cha'o// lus dang srog la mi lta bas dam pa'i chos yongs su
263a7: 'dzin pa'i go cha'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs stsogs pas ngoms mi myong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha'o// sbyin pa'i tshogs sna tshogs bsags pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po lus kyi rgyan gyi go cha'o// mngon par
263a8: shes pa thob pas bdud dad pas kyi rgol ba thams cad btul ba'i go cha'o/ / so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes kyis sems can thams cad shin du tshim par byed pa'i go cha'o// gzungs kyi ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
263b1: nyan pa dang tshol ba'i go cha'o/ / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i go cha'o// shes rab kyi ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i go cha'o//
263b2: shes rab dang ye shes kyi stobs yang dag par bsgrubs pas stobs bcu yongs su skong ba'i go cha'o// thams cad du sems gong ba med pas mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i go cha'o// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos tham
263b3: cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yongs su skor ba'i go cha'o/ / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / chu zla lta bur thos kyang mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur
263b4: ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skrag pa'i go cha ste/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes kyang sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
263b5: rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i go cha'o/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar thos kyang tshe dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba kun tu ston pa de ni byang
263b6: chab sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha'o/ / chos thams cad nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes shing 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par rig kyang 'gog par mi ltung zhing 'bras bu mngon sum du
263b7: yang mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi byin gyis rlabs mi 'khrugs pa'i go cha'o/ / go cha chen po nyi shu po de dag bgos nas de theg pa chen po la mngon par zhugs pa yin no// theg pa chen po de ni bsdu ba'i da
263b8: pos gang pang lo bzhi dang legs par ldan par byas pa bsam pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pas rtsibs shin du sbyar ba/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ye shes lhag par che bas lte ba zab cing legs par byas pa/
264a1: sems can thams cad kyi khur bya ba'i phyir srog shing dang ldan zhing shin du bzung ba/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pas shing rta'i mda' brtan par sbyar ba/ chos rin po che thams cad kyis
264a2: legs par brgyan pas rin po che thams cad kyi kha ran gyis bskur ba/ sngon dam bcas pa kha 'og tu lus 'grus par byed pas lhag pa'i bsam pa bsra ba'i 'breng bas bcings pa/ thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas
264a3: gtang shing gi khur byer ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi bu gar legs par sbyar ba/ bden pa bani yongs su shes pa'i stobs kyi 'gros can/ cang shes stong rab tu 'bad pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
264a4: thams cad du 'gro ba/ dran pa'i ru dag rin po che'i phreng ba'i srad bus bcings pa/ sems can thams cad shod bas rgya che zhing yangs par rgyu ba dang / dgra dang bdud kyi dgra 'dul ba/ legs par bya ba byas pa/ rig pa dang ye shes
264a5: rab tu sbyong ba/ byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ seng ge'i khri shin tu brgyan pa/ lha dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ gzugs bzang zhing /
264a6: zas mi rims pa/ bstan sdug pa/ rdo rje ltar sa zhing mi tshugs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba/ kha lo sbyar bas shin du bsdus shing bzung ba/ nag tu byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'grogab/ smon la
264a7: gi yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa'i rjes su song bas gar dga' dgur 'gro ba/ phyogs bcur rnam par lta ba'i lha'i mig sdang ba thob pa/ phyogs zi nur sdang bar byed pa'i phyir 'od yangs pa rnam par dag cing 'od zer mtha' yas pa/ byang chub
264a8: kyiyan lag gi me tog gi char rgyun du 'bab pas rtag tu me tog gis gang ga/ rtag tu chos yang dag par brjod pa'i rol mo sil snyan dang ldan pa/ skye ba'i 'khor bskal pa 'thun pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad tshor
264b1: yon tan gyi rnam pa tshad med pa'i ye shes mtha' yas pas shin du 'phags pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu theg pa chen po de ni de 'dra'o//
264b2: skyes bu dam pa de dag de'i phyir go bgos nas mngon par zhugs te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de la rab tu zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa mthob kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yinan/
264b3: lam dang go cha dang theg pa bkod pa 'di bstan pa na lha dang mi'i srog chags bdun khri nyi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni 'jig rten las 'das kyi
264b4: lam yongs su dag pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ / / 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis nus pa// bam po drug pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis byang chu
264b5: sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par spangs so// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag rnam par dag pas rnam par spangs so// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod
264b6: ji ltar na bdag rnam par dag/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten rnam par dag pas bdag rnam par dag go// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten rnam par dag pa 'di gang // smras pa/ gzugs sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pas/ 'phob
264b7: yang med/ gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pas 'ong ba yang med/ gzugs da ltar byung ba yang rnam par dag pas chos nyid gnas pa ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi
264b8: mtha' rnam par dag pas 'pho ba yang med/ rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pas 'ong ba yang med/ rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba yang rnam par dag pas chos nyid gnas pa ste/ de ni rigs kyi bu 'jig rten rnam par dag pa
265a1: zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ de ltar rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten ci la lta/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten ni chos thams cad la lta'o// smras pa/ ji ltar na chos thams cad la lta// smras pa/ shes rab dang
265a2: ye shes kyis chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar yongs su chad par rab tu shes so// smras pa/ chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang / smras pa/ gang la chad pa yang med// rtag pa yang med pa'o// /
265a3: smras pa/ gang la chad pa yang med rtag pa yang med pa de la ci zhes bya/ smras pa/ gang la chad pa yang med rtag pa yang med pa de la ni skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'o// smras pa/ gang la skye ba yang med 'gag pa yang med pa de ci
265a4: zhes bya/ smras pa/ gang skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa de ni ji skad ces kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de bgrang du med cing brjod du med pa'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bgrang du med pa'i chos ji ltar bgrang bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ 'di lta
